K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:418a-31: aaksha ya karma a'a ba ra na bi sho dha ne sv'ah'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:418a-35: aom sa manta bha dre h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:418a-37: bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngags 'di dag rim pa bzhin du brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:418b-0: 'di dag gis rgyud du ji skad gsungs @418b pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i cho ga'i rim pas nyin re zhing snga ba'i dus su bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom bzhin pas lha'i rnal 'byor ting nge 'dzin gsum mchog 'bad pas bsgoms te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:418b-1: ngan song yongs su sbyong bar grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:418b-3: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i gsang ba'i snying po 'di rigs kyi bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:418b-5: gang 'ga' zhig ming tsam nyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:418b-11: mgul bar btags te 'chang bar byed na de'i tshe 'di nyid la dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:418b-12: 'chi ba dang 'brel ba'i rmi lam 'byung ba'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:418b-13: ngan song dang 'brel ba'i mtshan ma de dag thams cad rmi lam tsam du yang mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:418b-14: gang 'ga' zhig dkyil 'khor du yang ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs nas dbang bskur te snying po yang zlos shing sngags kyi don sgom par byed na lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:418b-15: de dag la sdig pa gang cung zad kyang nye bar mi 'gyur zhing ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419a-0: dmyal ba la sogs pa gang yang rung ba shi ba'i lus rnams dkyil @419a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419a-1: 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419a-2: de dmyal bar skyes na yang de ma thag nyid du rnam par thar nas lha'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419a-3: lha'i rigs der skyes par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid mngon sum du byed cing phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419a-4: rgyud nges pa can du yang 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419a-5: sgrib pa rnams rab tu spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419a-7: gzhan du yang bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419a-10: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419a-11: bde ba thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419a-12: de nas lha'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la snga ma bzhin du bskor ba byas te phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419a-14: ngan song thams cad kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419a-15: ji ltar sems can rnams ngan song thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419a-16: bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde blag tu rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du chos bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i ye @419b shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419b-1: de mgon po sh'akya thub pa nyid kyis gsungs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419b-2: dang po re zhig rnal 'byor pas skye bos dben pa'i yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i sa phyogs su 'jam zhing shin tu 'bol ba'i stan la 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419b-3: dri bzang pos mandal byas nas nye bar spyod pa lnga'i mchod pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419b-4: de nas chos thams cad bdag med par bsgoms la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419b-5: bdag nyid yi ge h'um gis rdo rjes 'bar ba me nyi mar bsgoms te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419b-6: de'i mgrin par yi ge hr'i: las padma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419b-7: de'i steng du 'dab ma'i rtse mor yi ge aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419b-8: de'i steng du yi ge h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419b-9: rdo rje de lce la thim par bya zhing bdzra dzi hva zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419b-10: des rdo rje'i lcer 'gyur zhing sngags zlos pa nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419b-11: lag pa gnyis kyi dbus su yi ge aa dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419b-12: de'i steng du yi ge h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419b-13: de gnyis lag pa'i mthil du thim par bya ste rdo rje'i lag par 'gyur zhing phyag rgya 'ching bar nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:419b-14: de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420a-0: aom gri hna badzra sa ma ya h'um bam zhes brjod cing khro bo ti rin ti ri bcings @420a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420a-2: rdo rje bsdams pa nang byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420a-3: mthe bong rdo rje dam po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420a-4: khro bo'i yid kyis dgab bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420a-5: khro bo ti rin ti ri bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420a-6: de nas rdo rje phyed pa'i gdan gyis 'dug pas rdo rje ti rin ti ri bcings la rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba gzung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420a-7: aom badzra dzva la aa na la aarga h'um aa bhi shinytsa tu m'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420a-9: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bong gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba rdo rje bsdams pa'i steng du dgab pa'i tshul du gzung ba na rdo rje ti rin ti ri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420a-10: aom tum zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis po 'di'i go chas go cha bgos nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420a-11: aom badzra dzva la aa na la aarga h'um zhes bya ba sgrogs shing g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420a-12: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gsor zhing bgegs thams cad la bsnun no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420a-13: de nas rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas bgegs bsreg par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420a-14: aom badzra dzva la aa na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bhanydza ra na h'um phat ces brjod cing rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la sor mo rnams nang du 'bar ba la mthe bo rdo rje bsgreng ba 'di ni rdo rje me'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420a-15: de'i rjes la badzra ne tr'i bandha sarba bi ghan di na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420a-16: zhes pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas bgegs thams cad bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420b-0: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo gnyis brkyang ste mnyam la bzung ba ni rdo rje spyan gyi phyag @420b rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420b-1: rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang ba sa la bzhag ste 'og bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420b-2: aom badzra dri dho me bha ba raksha sarb'am sv'ah'a zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420b-3: rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas steng bcing bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420b-4: aom hu lu hu lu h'um phat ces pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420b-5: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar bskor nas mgo bo'i steng du bzung ba ni rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420b-6: de'i 'og tu rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas slar steng bcing bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420b-7: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes pa 'di dang rdo rje thal mo mthe bo gnyis brkyang la mdzub mo gnyis mche ba lta bur byas pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420b-8: rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas shar phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420b-9: aom drum bandha ham zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420b-11: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sprel la mdzub mo gnyis rtse sbyar la bzlog nas spyi bor bzhag pa ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420b-12: yang rdo rje zhags pas shar de nyid bcing bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420b-13: aom badzra p'a sha hr'i: zhes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420b-14: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mkhrig ma mdud pa byas pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420b-15: rdo rje ba dan gyis nub phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:420b-16: aom badzra pa t'am ke pa t'am gi ni ra ta zhes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421a-0: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bong gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung byas la mdzub mo gnyis mnyam por gshibs @421a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421a-1: te phye la mthe'u chung ba dan ltar byas pa ni rdo rje ba dan gyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421a-5: 'og gi bgegs rnams tshar gcad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421a-6: rdo rje dus kyis byang phyogs bcings te hr'i: badzra k'a la li rut ma ta zhes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421a-7: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya snying gar bstan par byas pa ni rdo rje dus kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421a-8: rdo rje rtse mos lho bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421a-9: aom badzra shi kha re rut ma ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421a-10: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ri bo 'degs pa'i tshul ni rdo rje rtse mo'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421a-11: rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor bcing bar byas la ra ba bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421a-13: yang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis nang du ra ba bya ste h'um zhes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421a-14: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la rdo rje mkhrig ma gnyis bsnol te mthe'u chung gnyis lcags kyur sbrel la mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub tu sgreng ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421a-15: 'di nyid las mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis rdo rje ltar byas pa ni rdo rje las kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421a-16: rdo rje bsdams pas rdo rje'i gur sbyin par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421a-17: badzra bandha bam zhes pa 'dis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421a-18: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor mdun du rdzogs par bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421a-19: aom badzra bi d'a badzra tsa kra h'um zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421a-20: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-0: mdzub mo @421b mthe'u chung rdo rje bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-1: rdo rje 'khor lo zhes grags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-2: dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-3: 'dis phyogs thams cad du g-yas skor nyid kyis bskor ba las dkyil 'khor thams cad sprul bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-4: 'di nyid khar bzhag nas nges par lta bzhin du rdo rje 'khor lo'i sngags lan brgyad bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-5: de yis dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-6: de nas mngon sum lta bur blos dmigs la me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-7: phyogs thams cad du yan lag lnga ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-9: aom sarba bidy'a k'a ya p'a ktsi tta pra na me na badzra pandha nam ka ro mi zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-10: de nas phyag bzhi bya ba ste 'di ltar lus thams cad kyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-11: rdo rje thal mo brkyang bas shar phyogs su phyag byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-12: aom sarba bitp'u dza au pastha n'a ya aatma nam ni rya ta y'a mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-13: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra satva aa dhi tishtha m'am zhes pa 'dis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-14: de nas de bzhin du langs la rdo rje thal mo snying gar byas te lho phyogs su dpral ba sa la reg cing phyag bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-15: aom sarba bid'a badzra aa bhi she ka ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-16: a'atm'a nam ni rya ta ya mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-17: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa mam zhes bya ba 'dis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-18: de nas de bzhin du langs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-19: rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-20: nub phyogs su kha sa la reg cing phyag bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:421b-21: aom sarba bitp'u dz'a pra brta n'a ya aatm'a nam ni rya ta y'a i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422a-1: ta th'a ga ta badzra dha rma pra brta ya mam zhes bya ba 'dis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422a-2: de nas de bzhin du langs la rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422a-3: snying gar byas la byang phyogs su spyi bo sa la reg cing phyag bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422a-4: aom sarba bitp'u dza karma ne aatm'a nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422a-5: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra karma ku ru m'am zhes pa 'dis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422a-6: de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422a-7: rdo rje thal mo snying gar byas la sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422a-8: phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422a-9: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422a-14: las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422a-19: lha thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422a-20: bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422a-21: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyan snga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422a-26: las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422a-31: sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi yang spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422a-34: de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422b-0: byang chub @422b sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422b-2: 'phags pa nyan thos yang dag par song ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422b-3: yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422b-4: sems can gyi rigs thams cad kyi bsod nams thams cad la rgya cher rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422b-5: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo mi bskor ba thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir bskul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422b-6: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa thams cad la mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'debs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422b-7: de nas me tog gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422b-8: aom sarba bid pushpa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422b-9: bdug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422b-10: aom sarba bid dh'u pam p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422b-11: mar me phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422b-12: aom sarba bid d'i pam p'u dz'a me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422b-13: dri'i phyag rgya bcing sla 'di skad ces brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422b-14: aom sarba bid gandh'a p'u dz'a me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:422b-15: thal mo snyim pa khong stong du sbyar ba bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:423a-0: aom sarba bid bo dhyam ga ratna aa langk'a ra p'u dz'a me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye @423a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:423a-2: aom biddh'a s+ya l'a s+ya ra ti kr'i t'a soo khya aa nutta ra p'u dz'a me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:423a-3: aom sarba bid aa nutta ra bo dhi aa langk'a ra wastra p'u dz'a me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:423a-4: de nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rjes su dran par byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:423a-5: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:423a-6: snying rje'i dbang gis sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:423a-7: ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:423a-8: ma grol ba rnams grol bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:423a-9: dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-10: bden pa mthong bar mdzad pa po //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-12: yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-13: sbyin pas sems can thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-14: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-15: gtsug tor rgyal mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-16: nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-17: gcod cing bdud bzhi'i stobs bcom nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-18: sems can byang chub thob mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-19: gtsug tor rnon po khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-20: khams gsum 'gro ba thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-21: gdugs dkar gyis ni brgyan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-22: chos kyi rgyal po thob mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-23: gtsug tor gdugs dkar khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-24: sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-25: gar mkhan lha mo bzhi po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-26: spos dang me tog mar me ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-27: dri yi lha mo khyod phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-28: dad sogs ngo bo las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-29: sgo bzhi'i dbus na gang bzhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431a-30: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-0: sgo skyong khyed rnams @431b la phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-1: sgo bzhi yi ni logs dag na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-2: khyams rnams su ni bzhugs mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-3: rab dga' la sogs bcu gnyis gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-4: byang chub sems dpa' khyed phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-5: tshangs dbang drag po zla ba sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-6: phyogs bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-7: me dang srin po rlung lha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-9: bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-10: dkyil 'khor mdun du kun bstod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-11: sngags pa rdo rje dril 'chang bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-12: bstod pa 'di dag yang dag brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-13: phyi nas rang gi lus la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-14: bdag nyid dkyil 'khor rab tu gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-15: de ltar nges par bsgom bzhin pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-16: dkyil 'khor dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-17: de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba rab tu bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-18: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am aa dya nu ta panna tva ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-19: de'i don ni rnam par thar ba las phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad stong ba nyid bcu drug tu lhag par mos par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-20: ngar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid stong pa nyid du blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-21: de nas yi ge h'um las rdzogs pa'i rdo rjes rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-22: de'i steng du yi ge ram las me'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-23: de'i steng du yi ge bam las chu gter chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-24: de'i steng du yi ge kam las gser gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:431b-25: de'i steng du dbus su h'um su h'um zhes bya ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-1: ra ba gru bzhi pa rin po che'i rang bzhin rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa bskyed la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-2: aom badzra dri dho zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-3: rdo rje bsdams pas byin gyis brlab po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-4: de'i steng du rdo rje'i rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas yi ge bhr'um dkar po las byung ba'i rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-6: rin po che'i rtse mo tsan gyi gzhal yas khang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-7: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-8: rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-9: gru bzhi rnams ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-10: sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-11: zla ba mtshan ma rdo rjes spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-12: dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-13: thig le dang ni yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-14: dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-15: nang gi dkyil 'khor ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa rdo rje phreng bas yongs su bskor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-16: de'i lte ba'i steng du sengge'i gdan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-17: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-18: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i nang rnams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te lha rnams kyi gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-19: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi gnas ni snam bu rnams la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa brgyad blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-20: sengge'i gdan gyi steng gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yi ge aa la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-21: yi ge ka la sogs pa shes rab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432a-22: thabs kyi yi ge zhu bar gyur ba mkha' khyab kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-0: @432b byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyis sems can gyi don gyi rgyu rdzogs pa'i sngags kyi gzugs su gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-1: aom mu ne mu ne mah'a mu na ye sv'ah'a sngags 'dis dpal sh'a kya'i rgyal po rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-2: sgrib pa thams cad sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-3: de nas ting nge 'dzin snyoms par zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i phyag rgya dang sngags bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-4: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcing nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-5: rim gyis rnam par dbye bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-6: chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-7: 'khor ba thams cad gcod byed yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-8: de yi dpe ni 'di lta ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-9: ji ltar padma la chags pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-10: bung ba la sogs bsdams pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-12: bcings pa'i sdug bsngal las thar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-13: de bzhin 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-15: thugs rje'i bdag nyid sh'akya yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-16: sengges bcings pa las grol mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-17: de nas dpal sh'akya thub pa'i thugs kar yi ge aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-18: de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sngags thams cad kyis bskyed par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-19: rdo rje gtsug tor nas brtsams te ji srid rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa 'byung ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:432b-21: aom na mo bha ga ba te sarba durga [?] ti pa ri sho dha na r'a dz'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-2: aarha te sa myaksam buddha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-4: aom sho dha ne sho dha ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-5: sarba p'a pam sho dha ne shuddhe bi shuddhe sarba karma a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe sv'h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-7: de nas de'i phyir go rims ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-8: rims bzhin yang dag rab bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-10: kha yi sgo nas phung nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-12: kun nas phyogs bcur snang byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-13: sems can rnams ni thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-14: sdug bsngal rnams ni thar mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-15: 'od zer rnams ni slar logs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-16: thugs kar zhugs te de rjes la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-18: las byung sku ni yongs rdzogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-20: shar phyogs padma zla bar bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-21: rdo rje gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-22: sems can kun la phan don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-23: thugs ka las byung bzhugs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-25: sa gnon phyag rgya yang dag bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-26: de ltar 'od zer spro bsdu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-27: sngar bshad pa yi thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-28: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-30: sku ni bskyed cing yang dag rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-31: ji bzhin gnas su bzhugs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-32: aom ratno [?] ta ta ma tr'am zhes bya bas dbyung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433a-33: lho yi rtsibs su yang dag bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-0: padma zla ba'i @433b dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-1: rin chen gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-2: thugs ka nas ni nges bton nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-3: sangs rgyas mtshan gyis yang dag brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-4: sku mdog sngo zhing shin tu mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-5: 'di yi phyag rgya mchog sbyin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-6: khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-7: sems can kun la dbang bskur mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-8: sngar bzhin spro dang bsdu ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-9: gzugs bskyed pa yi rim pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-12: de nas nub kyi rtsibs gnas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-13: pad steng zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-14: sa bon 'od zer gyis rdzogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-15: padma gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-16: thugs ka las ni phyung gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-17: rjes su ston mdzad bzhugs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-19: bsam gtan phyag rgyas rnam par bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-20: aom bi shvo tat [?] ma aa: zhes dbyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-21: byang phyogs rtsibs gnas padma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-22: steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-23: thugs ka nas bton sangs rgyas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-24: sna tshogs gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-27: phyag rgyas 'phrin las sna tshogs mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-28: sems can 'khor ba las sgrol ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-29: yi ge aom gyis sangs rgyas dbyung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-30: gtsug tor gzi brjid de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-31: me yi mtshams gnas padmar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-32: yang dag zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:433b-33: g-yas pas nyi ma yang dag bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-0: @434a *// phyag g-yon pa ni dku la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-1: sku mdog dkar dmar 'od kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-2: khams gsum po ni snang bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-3: h'um gi sa bon las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-4: gtsug tor rgyal mtshan de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-5: thugs ka las byung phyung nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-6: bden bral rtsibs la bzhugs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-7: pad gnas zla ba'i gzugs la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-8: sku mdog dmar zhing gnag pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-9: yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-10: sems can ser sna sbyong mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-11: dh'i: yig sa bon las rdzogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-12: gtsug tor rnon po de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-13: nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-14: gcod mdzad rlung gi rtsibs su phyung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-15: padma zla ba la bzhugs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-16: 'di yi phyag mtshan g-yas ral gri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-17: g-yon na glegs bam bsnams pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-18: sku mdog mkha' ltar sngo ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-19: padma la gnas zla bar bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-20: tr'am yig sa bon las byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-21: gtsug tor gdugs dkar de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-22: sems can rnams kyi chos kyi rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-23: dbang ldan rtsibs su dbyung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-24: kunda lta bu'i mdog lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-25: 'di yi phyag mtshan gdugs bsnams pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-26: de kun sna tshogs padmar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-27: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-29: sngags de rnams su brjod nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-30: thugs ka nas kyang dbyung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434a-31: mtshams kyi gnas ni bzhi po ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-1: sgeg mo la sogs lha mo bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-2: rigs kyi sku mdog 'dzin pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-3: dkar ser dmar po sna tshogs mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-4: de nas phyag rgya bcing ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-5: sngar bshad ji skad bshad bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-6: sngags de nyid ni brjod nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-7: thugs ka nas kyang dbyung bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-8: bdug pa la sogs lha mo bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-9: padma la gnas zla ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-10: dkyil 'khor du ni mtshams bzhi po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-11: thams cad du yang sku mdog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-12: rigs kyi rim pa nyid kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-13: aom sarba sam ska ra pa ri shuddhe dharma te ga ga nas sa mung+ga ga te sva bh'a ba bi shuddhe ma h'a na ya ba ri w'a re sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-14: sngags kyis dbyung ste shar gyi sgo'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-15: gzhogs gnyis dag tu gnas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-16: byams pa la sogs gnas bzhi po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-17: pad gnas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-18: thams cad sems dpa'i skyil krung can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-19: phyag rgya sku mdog rim pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-20: byams pa thugs ni rnam dag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-21: sku mdog ser po 'od zer bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-22: g-yas pa klu shing me tog can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-23: g-yon pas spyi blugs bsnams pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-24: gnyis pa mthong ba don yod ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-26: phyag g-yas padma spyan can te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-27: g-yon pa'i phyag ni dkur bzhag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-28: byang chub sems dpa' gsum pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-29: mtshan ni ngan song spong 'joms pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-31: phyag rgya lcags kyu bsnams pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-32: bzhi pa mya ngan mun pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:434b-33: nges 'joms blo gros de bzhin te //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435a-6: lho sgor rab tu bzhugs pa 'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435a-19: gsum pa nam mkha' mdzod nyid de //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435a-22: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par spangs //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435a-27: bzhi ba yang ni ye shes tog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435a-28: bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435a-29: sngon po'i mdog can yang dag gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435a-30: yid sbyin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435a-31: g-yon pa'i khu tshur dkur 'jog cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-0: @435b dbul ba'i sdug bsngal dgrol bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-1: nub sgo'i drung du padma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-2: gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-3: dang po bdud rtsi 'od ces pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-4: zla ba'i mdog gis rnam par mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-5: bdud rtsi'i bum pa legs par bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-6: cod pan rin chen phyag gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-7: g-yon pa khu tshur dkur 'jog cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-8: rgya chen tshe ni stsol ba po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-9: gnyis pa'i mtshan ni zla ba'i 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-10: mi shes pa yi mun pa gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-11: sku mdog dkar po mdzes pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-12: phyag rgya g-yas pa'i phyag nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-13: padmar gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-14: g-yon pa khu tshur dkur bzhag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-15: gsum pa bzang skyong zhes bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-16: dkar zhing dmar ba'i mdog can nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-17: chos rnams thams cad rab gsal mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-18: phyag rgya phyag ni g-yas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-19: rin chen 'bar ba yang dag bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-20: g-yon pa khu tshur dkur gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-21: byang chub sems dpa' bzhi pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-22: dra ba can gyi 'od mtshan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-24: rdo rje'i gur ni bsnams pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-25: byang sgo'i rtsa bar padma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-26: gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-27: sangs rgyas sras po dang po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-28: mtshan ni rdo rje snying po zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-29: dkar zhing sngo ba'i mdog dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-30: phyag rgya phyag ni g-yas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-31: autpal la ni rdo rjer ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-32: g-yon pa khu tshur dkur gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:435b-33: gnyis pa blo gros zhes pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-1: zad pa thar yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-2: kun tu zla ba'i mdog ltar gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-3: phyag rgya phyag ni gnyis pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-4: ye shes bum pa yang dag bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-5: sems can thams cad rab tshim mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-6: sangs rgyas sras po gsum pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-7: spobs pa brtsegs pa'i tha snyad can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-9: phyag rgya phyag g-yas padma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-10: gnas pa'i rin chen phung po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-11: g-yon pa khu tshur dkur gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-12: rgyal ba'i sras po bzhi po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-13: kun tu bzang po zhes bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-15: g-yas pa'i phyag gi phyag rgya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-16: rin chen snye ma bsnams pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-17: g-yon pa khu tshur dkur brten pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-18: de lta'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-19: byang chub sems dpa' brtse ba dag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-20: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-21: aom mu ne mu ne ma h'a mu na ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-22: na ma: sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha na r'a dza'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-24: aarha te sa mya ksam buddha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-26: aom sho dha ne sho dha ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-27: sarba p'a pam bi sho dha ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-28: shuddhe bi shuddhe sarba karma aa ba ra na bi shuddhe sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436a-29: sngags 'dis sh'akya'i rgyal po la sogs pa lha sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs par bsgom mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-0: de nas de'i rjes la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor @436b spyan drang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-1: sngags dang phyag rgya mnyam ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-2: sgo ni dbye bar byas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-3: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-4: mdzub mo gnyis ni rab tu brkyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-5: mthe'u chung lug gu rgyud byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-6: sgo dbye ba yi phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-7: aom sarba bidy'a dha ra aud gha da ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-8: sgo dbye ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas sgo dbye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-9: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor yongs su bteg ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-10: aom sarba bidy'a badzra tsa kra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-11: lag ngar dag ni rdo rjer bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-12: rdo rje se gol rnam grol bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-13: sh'akya'i rgyal po sbyor bdag dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-14: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-15: g-yon pa se gol brdabs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-16: mnyam par brdabs par grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-17: g-yas pa yis kyang brdab par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-18: gnyis ka yang ni bsdus pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-19: aom badzra sa m'a dza: dza: h'um bam ho:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-20: bka' bsgo ba 'di bsgrags tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-22: sangs rgyas thams cad byon 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-23: gzhan rnams rab 'jug lta ci smos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-24: de nas mdun gyi nam mkhar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bltas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-25: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags kyis mchod yon gyi snod na gnas pa'i dri'i chu yis yang dag par bsangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:436b-27: de nas mchod yon gyi phyag rgyas mchod yon dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437a-0: de nas zhabs bsil gyi phyag @437a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437a-2: de nas aom badzra pushpe h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437a-6: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyas bgegs bskrad la dkyil 'khor du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437a-7: de nas yang phyag rgya dang por sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya'i cho gas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437a-8: de nas sngar bshad pa'i sngags kyis chos kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437a-9: de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i sngags kyis las kyi phyag rgya bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437a-10: de nas phyag rgya chen po'i sngags kyis phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437a-11: de nas rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems ma rdo rje ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437a-12: rin chen rdo rje ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437a-13: chos kyi rdo rje ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437a-14: las kyi rdo rje ma rnams spros te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437a-15: dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i lha dpal sh'akya'i rgyal po nas brtsams pa'i rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa la dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437a-17: bdag po ste sa bcu'i mthar thug pa sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437a-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dhu pe h'u dz'a me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437a-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pushpe p'u dz'a me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437a-21: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta d'i pe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437a-22: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gandhe p'u dz'a me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-0: de nas @437b sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi yis mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-1: rdo rje gsor zhing rdo rje'i tshig yi ge brgya pa sngon du 'gro bas sngar bzhin bstod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-3: mnyam med mi g-yo mnyam med snying po'i chos can ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-4: thugs rje'i bdag nyid can nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-5: yon tan dngos grub thams cad mtha' yas sbyin mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-6: dri med mi g-yo mnyam med mchog rab chos can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-7: yon tan mchog ni phra mo'i cha la'ang mtshams med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-8: nam mkha' dang mnyam dper gyur pa nyid yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-9: sems can khams la grub mchog stsol ba rnams la gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-10: dngos grub mtha' yas rnams la dpe dang rnam dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-11: dri med thugs rje brgya pa nyid kyi shugs las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-12: smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-13: 'gro ba'i don sgrub lhur mdzad mtha' yas mnga' ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-14: thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-15: 'gag med nyid kyi thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g-yo ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-16: 'jig rten gsum la mchog gi dngos grub stsol ba 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-17: dpag med dpag bral rnams la shin tu rdzogs nyid rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-18: bde ba'i gnas su gshegs kyang ae ma'o chos nyid bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-19: rtag tu mchog sbyin nyid de bde 'gro nyid du gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-20: mtha' dag 'jig rten gsol la dngos grub mchog ni stsol ba po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-21: bde gshegs dus gsum bgrod nyid sgrib pa mi mnga' nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:437b-22: dam tshig gsum mchog dngos grub mchog sbyin bdag la stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-2: thams cad la lce brgya pa'i kha yis bstod pa nye bar spyod par mos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-4: dril bu 'dzin pas bstod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-5: de nas phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-8: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyi rol gyi lha rnams la mchod pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-9: gtor ma'i cho ga nye bar mkho ba dang bcas pa'i gtor ma dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-10: dpung ba bzang po'i tshigs bcad brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-11: dang por se gol la sogs sgras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-12: khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-13: sdig pa'i phung po dgug bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-14: yi ge gsum sogs yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-15: 'jig rten khams ni ma lus pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-16: sdig pa thams cad mnyam por spong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-17: dgug dang gdon dang bcing ba rnam par gzhom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-18: sngags bzhi po rnams legs par sbyar ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-19: bdag sogs sngags te yungs kar dang por brdeg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-20: shi ba'i rus pa gos la rab bkru ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-21: aom sho dha ne zhes sogs sngags kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-22: srid gsum dri ma chu yis bkru ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-23: aom kam ka ni zhes sogs sngags kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-24: ba yi rnam pa lnga yis bkru bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-25: aom ratne ratne zhes sogs sngags kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-26: dri bzang rnams ni kun gyis bkru bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438a-27: aom aa mo gha a'a ba ra na sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-0: sngags kyis ba yi 'o @438b mas bkru bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-1: aom aa mi te aa mi te zhes sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-2: sngags kyis tshar mchog gis kyang bkru bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-3: aom pu n+ye sogs pa'i sngags kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-4: bar dang bar du chu yis bkru bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-5: yang bkra shis kyi glu blang zhing dbang bskur te lam sbyang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-6: bdug pa la sogs lha mo bzhi'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-7: de nas 'di yi thab khung ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-8: khru gang tsam la sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-9: ngan 'gro kun tu gnas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-10: sems can de rjes dran byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-11: dge ba'i rgyud phyir sdig pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-12: sgrib pa zhi phyir bsreg bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-13: mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-14: 'bras yos yungs kar bsres pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-16: bud shing rnams su lag gnyis kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-17: las rnams gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-18: snga ma ji ltar de ltar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-19: de yis myur du sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-20: bde ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-21: las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-22: de dag kyang sems can de la byas pa de nas de dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las rnam par grol bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:438b-23: dga' ldan gyi gnas su sems can thams cad la phan par mdzad pa bde bar gshegs pa dang ldan par skyes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439a-0: de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams snyan grags dang bcas pas gar byed cing sngags kyi mchod pa'i sprin mtha' yas pas skye ba 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir lha'i tshogs @439a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439a-2: byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439a-8: ba dan la sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439a-9: rgyan du ma rnams kyis kyang mdzes shing na bza' dang rin po che'i char la sogs pas kyang dga' ba'i tshal yongs su gang bar byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439a-10: de nas ngo mtshar che bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439a-11: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis sngags kyi brtag pa'i rgyal po brtag pa phyi ma gsungs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439a-14: dpa' bo gdan las bzhengs nas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439a-15: dgyes pas rdo rje gsor zhing sh'akya'i bdag po dgyes pa thub pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439a-16: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439a-17: aom sarba a'a p'a ya bi sho dha na badzra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439a-18: aom sarba karma a'a ba ra n'a ni bha smi ku ru h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-0: aom brum bi n'a sha ya sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni badzra h'um @439b phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-1: aom drum bi sho dha ya sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-2: aom dzva la dzva la dha ka dha ka ha na ha na sarba a'a bar n'a ni h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-3: aom srum sa ra sa ra pra sa ra pra sa ra sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-4: aom h'um ha ra ha ra sarba a'a ba na n'a ni h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-5: aom h'um phat sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-6: aom bri ta bri ta sarba a'a wa ra n'a ni h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-7: aom tra ta tra ta sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-8: aom tsitshandha tsitshandha sarba a'a ba ra ra n'a ni h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-9: aom da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga ti he tum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-10: aom pa tsa pa tsa sarba pre ta ka ga ti he tum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-11: aom ma tha ma tha sarba tir ya ka ga ti he tum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-12: de nas de dag gis nye bar mkho ba rnams spyad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-13: aom sarba p'a pam bi sho dha ne dha ma dh'u pa ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-14: aom sarba durga ti bi sho dha ne pushpa bi lo ki ni h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-15: aom sarba a'a p'a ya bi sho dha ni dzny'a n'a lo ka ka ri h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-16: aom sarba a'a p'a ya ga ti gandha n'a sha ni gandha ba ti h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-17: aom sarba na ra ka ga ti a'a karsha ni h'um dza: phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-18: aom sarba na ra ka auddh'a ra ni h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-19: aom sarba a'a pa ya bandha na bi mo tsa ni h'um bam phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-20: aom sarba a'a p'a ya ga ti ga ha na bi ni sa ni h'um ho: phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-21: de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-23: rtsibs brgyad pa yis shin tu mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-24: lte ba mu khyud yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-25: nang gi rim pa bris nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-26: lte bar sh'akya'i dbang po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-27: bdag po thub pa bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:439b-28: phyag na rdo rje stobs chen ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-2: rgyab tu 'khor los bsgyur ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-3: legs par mngon par bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-4: g-yas su rgyal ba'i gtsug tor bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-5: g-yon du rnam par rgyal ba bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-6: gzi brjid phung po yang ni mer //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-7: dbang ldan du ni gdugs dkar po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-8: rnam par mtho ba rlung nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-9: rnam par 'joms pa bden bral bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-10: de nas phyi rol yang dag bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-11: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-12: rta babs bzhi pa shin tu mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-13: dpa' bo lcags kyu zhags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-14: lcags sgrog dril bu snyan rnams bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-15: grva yi phyogs ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-16: bdug pa la sogs bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-17: de nas me tog phreng ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-18: dri sogs rang gi lus la byug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-19: slob dpon 'jug par bya ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-20: dza: h'um bam ho: bha ga wa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-21: ae hye hi mah'a k'a ru ni k'a dri shya ho:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-22: zhes bya bas lha thams cad spyan drang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-23: de bzhin du bcug ste dbang bskur na ngan song thams cad las rnam par grol te bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang sa gong ma rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-24: dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-25: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gdon mi za bar thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-26: snga ma bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440a-27: bya ba byas pas rims thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440b-0: gdon la sogs pa rnams las @440b thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440b-1: phyag na rdo rje h'um zhes bya bas las thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440b-2: brtag pa gzhan gyis cho gas kyang las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440b-6: srin po la sogs pa ngan song gi dbang du gyur pa rnams 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan la sogs pa mngon par bris pa las bzlas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440b-8: dbang bskur ba rnams kyis ngan song thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas sengge'i lta stangs kyis zhal du bltas te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440b-11: phyag rgya mchog gi mtshan nyid dam pa bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440b-12: thugs rje'i gdung ba'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyal ba thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440b-13: ting nge 'dzin du gnas pas dpral bar thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440b-14: sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440b-15: rnal 'byor rig pas mgrin pa'i phyogs su thal mo kha phye ba padma'i rnam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440b-16: thugs kar rdo rje thal mo byas sor mo dbus ma rtse mo sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:440b-17: lag pa g-yon pa gan rkyal du bang par bzhag la de'i steng du g-yas pa bzlog ste bzhag la mthe bong gnyis sbyar te zhi ba'i lta bas blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-1: gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-2: de nyid yongs su bskor te phan tshun sbyar te mthe'u chung dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-3: mthe bong dag lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par bcings la snying gar gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-4: 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-5: thal mo gang bar sbyar nas mthe'u chung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-6: mthe bong sbyar te bzung zhing lhag ma rnams rab tu brkyang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-7: 'di ni padma rigs kyi padma'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-8: rdo rje bsdams par brtan par byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-9: gung mo gnyis rdo rje rtse mor byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-10: mthe'u chung dang mthe bo ra ba tu brkyang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-11: 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-12: de nyid kyis mthe'u chung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-13: mthe bong gnyis de bzhin du byas la mdzub mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-14: ming med padma'i 'dab ma'i rnam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-15: 'di ni ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-16: de nyid kyi mdzub mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-17: ming med dag rin po che'i rnam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-18: 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-20: mthe bong so so so sor sbyar nas lhag ma rnams rab tu brkyang ba ni mtshon cha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-21: lag pa g-yon pa de kho na bzhin du rab tu 'jug pa ni las thams cad pha'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441a-22: snyim pa gyen du 'thor ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441b-0: de nyid 'og nas @441b 'thor ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441b-1: de nyid mthe bong gnyis gyen du bsnyams la 'dzin pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441b-2: de nyid dung 'dra bar byas pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441b-3: de nyid rab tu brkyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441b-4: de nyid gung mo rnams nang du bcug pa ni aarga'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441b-5: rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo gnyis bsnyams te tshigs bar ma bcag nas sor mo thams cad brkyang ba 'di ni rnam par 'thor ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441b-7: mthe'u chung gnyis bkug pa ni rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441b-8: de nyid kyi snying pa 'od zer gyi rnam pa ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441b-9: de nyid spyi bo'i gnas su bskor ba ni gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441b-10: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mthe bong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441b-11: mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings la bskor ba 'di ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441b-12: rdo rje bsngams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la mdzub mo gnyis rin po che ltar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441b-13: lhag ma 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441b-14: de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la sor mo lhag ma rnams bsdams nas rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:441b-16: g-yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-1: las mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-2: de nyid las mdzub mo g-yas pa bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-3: de nyid las mda' 'dra bar byas pa ni mda'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-4: de nyid kyi phyag rgya dang mthe bong rtse sprad pa ni blo gros legs pa'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-5: de nyid kyi tshigs bar ma bcag pa ni rin po che'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-6: de nyid sor mo rnams 'od zer 'dra ba ni gzi brjid kyi 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-7: de nyid spyi bor bzhag pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-8: de nyid mdun du bzhag pa ni bzhad pa'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-9: de nyid padma 'dra bar byas pa ni padma'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-10: de nyid gung mo dang mdzub mo bkug pa ni ral gri'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-11: de nyid gdu bu 'dra bar byas pa ni 'khor lo'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-12: de nyid padma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa ni lce'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-13: de nyid rtse mo yid tsam bskyed pa ni sna tshogs kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-14: de nyid shin tu bskyed pa ni bsrung ba'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-15: de nyid rtse mo gnyis slar bkug pa ni gnod sbyin gyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-16: de nyid dam du bkug pa ni bsdams pa'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-17: de nyid mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-18: de nyid rtse mo sprad pa ni zhags pa'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-19: de nyid phan tshun mdud pa ni lcags sgrog gi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-20: de nyid bskyod pa ni dril bu'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-22: brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442a-25: skal ba chung ba rnams kyi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442b-2: tshe bsring ba'i slad du bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442b-3: bdag la gsang ba'i bdag pos bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes brgya byin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442b-5: tshangs pa la sogs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de dag la gzigs nas legs so zhes bya bas mgu bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442b-6: brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442b-7: gang khyod la 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang dag par skyes pa de ni legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442b-9: legs par sgrubs shig dang bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje thams cad tshe dpag tu med par khyab par 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas tshe dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442b-12: ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phel ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442b-13: aom pu n+ye pu n+ye mah'a pu n+ye aa pa ri mi ta a'a yu: pu n+ye dzny'a na sam bha ro bha tsi te ka ri ni sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad pa tsam gyis ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:442b-17: byol song gi 'gro ba rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar bdag nyid kyis rab tu shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-0: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas shing snang bar byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu gnyis byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi @443a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-1: snying po'i chos kyi yi ge de nyid du zhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-2: de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-4: aom aa mi te aa mi te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-6: aa mi ta sam bha be /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-7: aa mi ta bi kr'a nte /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-8: aa mi ta bi kranta g'a mi ni sarba ka rma kle sha kasha yam ka ri sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-9: de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rang tu zhi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-10: de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar sgrib pa thams cad rnams par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snyong po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-11: aom kam ka ni kam ka ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-12: ro tsam ni ro tsa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-13: tro ta ni tro ta ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-14: tr'a sa ni tr'a sa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-15: pra ti ha na pra ti ha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-16: sarba ka rma pa ram pa r'a ni me sarba satva na nytsa sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-17: 'di bshad pa tsam gyis thams cad de kho na bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443a-18: de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa thams cad dri ma med cing rtna par dag pa 'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa ma lus pa rnam @443b par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-5: ratna m'a l'a bi shud dhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-7: sarba bla pam h'um tra ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-8: de nas 'di bsahd ma thag tu bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom zhing rnam par bcom par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-9: de nas lar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar mi choms par sgrib pa thams cad rnams par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-10: aom aa mo gha aa pra ti ha ta sarba a'a ba ra na bi sho dha ni ha ra ha ra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-11: 'di bshad ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad g-yos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-13: yang dag par rab tu g-yos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-15: yang dag par rab tu bskyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-18: yang dag par rab tu bsgul zhing ngo mtshar che zhing rmad du byung ba du ma 'jig rten du snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-19: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-20: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-21: logs bzhi dang yang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-22: rta babs bzhi dang kun tu ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-23: kha khyer dang ni sgo khyud bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-24: de yi dbus su 'khor lo yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-25: dkyil 'khor dam pa bri par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-26: rtsi bas bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-27: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:443b-28: de yi dbus su mgon po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-0: phyag na rdo rje stobs chen @444a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-2: phyag na rdo rje dril bu can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-3: zla ba rgyas zhal 'dzum pa bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-4: shar gyi rtsibs kyi dbus kyi char //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-5: gtso bo mi bskyod pa nyid bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-6: lhor ni rin chen bri bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-7: nub tu chu skyes padma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-8: byang du gdon mi za zhes grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-9: dpa' bo stobs chen bri par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-11: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha lugs mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-13: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-14: phyag na mchog sbyin mi 'jigs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-15: rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs pa bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-16: grva yi cha rnams thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-17: de bzhin bdug pa la sogs bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-18: sgo skyong rnams kyang khro bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-19: mchog tu khro bar gzhol ba bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-20: de nas rnal 'byor rang nyid zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-21: sngags kyi lha rnams spyan drangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-22: dza: h'um bam ho: bha ga b'an //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-23: badzra ae hye hi sa ma ya stvam//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-24: de nas mgon po byon pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-25: mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-27: 'chi bdag gzhon phyir gzhugs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-28: aom badzra sa ma ye h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-29: rdo rje ti rin ti ri bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-30: lag na rin chen thogs pa gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-31: yang na me tog phreng ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-32: de dag dkyil 'khor nyid du dor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-33: aom pra t'i tstsha badzra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-34: de nas dam tshig sbyin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444a-35: aom badzra sa ma ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-0: de nas 'dis gdong g-yogs dgrol @444b par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-1: aom badzra h'a s+ya aud gha t'a ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-2: de nas 'dis dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-4: de nas dbang bskur ba sbyin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-5: aom badzra aa bhi sham nytsa h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-6: aom bu dadha aa bhi shi nytsa aom/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-7: aom ratan aa bhi shi nytsa tr'am/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-9: aom karma aa bhi shi nytsa aa:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-10: de nas bum pa'i dbang bskur sbyin te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-14: aom karma ka la sha aa bhi shi nytsa aa:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-15: de nas phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-16: aom ratna m'a la aa bhi shi nytsa tr'am tr'am tr'am tr'am tr'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-17: aom badzra patat aa ba lam ba na aa bhi shi nytsa tr'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-18: aom badzra mu dra aa bhi shi nytsa h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-19: aom budadh mu dra aa bhi shi nytsa aom/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-20: aom ratan mu dra aa bhi shi nytsa tr'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-21: aom padma mu dra aa bhi shi nytsa hr'i: aom ka rma mu dra aa bhi shi nytsa aa:/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-23: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa: aom badzra karma aa bhi shi nytsa h'um aa:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-24: aom badzra tskra aa bhi shi nytsa h'um brum/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:444b-36: aom badzra gu h+ye aa bhi shi nytsa h'um/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445a-2: aom karma gu h+ye aa bhi shi nytsa a'a:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445a-3: aom prajnya [?] p'a ya sa ma yo ga aa bhi shi nytsa h'um aa:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445a-4: de ltar dbang bskur nas tshe 'phel ba'i rig pa 'di spyon no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445a-8: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje tshe dpag med zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445a-11: de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag pa thal mo sbyar ba brkyang ba gdong gyen du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba bris la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod pa bya ste de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445a-12: de nas zla ba nya la mchod pa chen po byas la dmar ser gyi mar snod sar par bcug la g-yon pa'i rdo rjes mnan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445a-13: bcom ldan 'das la rab tu sems shing mtshan thog thag bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445a-14: de nas dri mnam zhing sngon ma byung ba'i dri ngad kyang ldang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445a-18: 'od zer gyi snang ba rab tu 'phros te de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung na mar de'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445a-29: gang yang rung ba dang lhan cig tu rab tu bsgrubs te nang par sngar srung pa la sogs pa byas nas bdag nyid sbyangs te 'thungs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445b-0: zos na mtshan ma ji @445b lta ba bzhin du byung na ni nam zla ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445b-1: nyi ma ji srid pa'i tsher 'gyur zhing rdo rje sems dpa'i tsher yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445b-2: tha mas ni dngos grub tha mar 'gyur te 'di la the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445b-3: mtshan ma ma byung na yang 'jig rten na nad med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445b-4: yid gzhungs pa dang ldan zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445b-7: lus brtan zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445b-8: gzhan yang bzlas pa byas pa tsam gyis zhi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445b-10: dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams brtag mi dgos par 'grub ste the tshom med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445b-11: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445b-13: bdag cag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445b-15: bde ba'i slad du rang ra nga gi snying po bshad par 'tshal gyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' gnang par zhu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445b-17: rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' gnang bar zhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445b-18: rgyal po chen po dag legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445b-21: ngas rjes su yi rang gi dam tshig byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445b-22: de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu ngal gsos pos bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang zhing rjes su yi rang ste byin gyis brlab bas rang gi snying po rang gi snying gnas phyung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:445b-24: de nas dri za'i rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis de khon bzhin du rang gi snying po bshad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-0: de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos de kho na bzhin du rang gi snying @446a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-3: de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis de kho na bzhin du rang gi snying po bshad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-5: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-6: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-7: dkyil 'khor lngas ni brgyan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-8: de yi dbus su mgon po ni //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-11: ngal gso dge pa lag pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-12: be con dang ni ne 'u le //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-13: rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-14: sbom zhing seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-15: gser mdog gzi brjid ldan pa bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-16: khas pas bum pa bzang la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-17: rin chen tshogs char 'bab pa bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-18: mdun du yul 'khor skyong nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-19: pe wang sgrogs par yang dag brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-20: rol cing kha dog ljang gu nyid //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-22: g-yas su dpa' bo lus 'phags po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-23: ral gri phyag na bsnams pa bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-24: nub tu yang ni mig mi bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-25: rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin cing mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-26: sbrul mgo bdun gyis yongs su bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-27: mig ni dmar zhing shin tu 'bur //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-29: sgo skyong rnams kyang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446a-30: de nas sngags pa rang nyid 'jug /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-3: sngags shes pa yi sngags 'di dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-4: rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-5: aom bdzra sa ma ye h'um/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-7: aom badzar pra ta'i tstsha dham ma ho ta ta ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-8: gang la lhung ba'i rgyal po de //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-11: bum pa bzhis kyang dbang bskur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-12: lnga pa phyag na rdo rje'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-13: phyag rgya nyid kyis dbang bskur bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-14: de la sogs pa'i go rims bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-15: dkyil 'khor bris nas dbang bskur bas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-17: rgyal po yin na chen por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-18: dzambu gling dbang dpal dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-19: gling bzhi pa yi bdag po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-20: lan bzhi dbang ni bskur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-21: lan bzhir rab tu zhugs na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-22: de la rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-23: rang gi bu bzhin bsrung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-24: bdag cag rgyal chen bzhi pos kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-26: yul 'khor pho brang bcas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-27: rgyal pos rtag tu bskyang bgyi ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-28: de yi ma rungs pa rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:446b-29: de yi pha rol sde dang nad //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:448a-14: bdag gis kyang sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du rlung gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar bgyi /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:449a-0: bsgrub pa thams cad la bgegs ma mchis @449a *//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:453a-7: skrag na de ma thag tu gsod //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:456b-12: de nas phreng ba da mgo la bcings la dbang bskur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:456b-13: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shinytsa dh'a ra a'a dzny'a pa ya h'um bhr'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:456b-14: aom badzra aa bhi shnyitsa h'um bhr'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:456b-15: aom ratna aa bhi shinytsa h'um tram/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:456b-16: aom padma aa bhi shinytsa h'um hr'i: aom karma aa bhi shinytsa h'um a'a: de nas dam tshig dang bka'i dbang bskur ba sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:456b-18: dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:456b-19: bla ma dam pa yong mi spong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:456b-20: srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:456b-21: ma byin par yang mi blang nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:456b-22: brdzun yang smra bar mi bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:456b-23: pha rol bud med spyan mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:456b-24: bla ma smad par mi bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:456b-26: slob dpon ma yin mi gzung zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:456b-27: mtshan ma slob dpon spangs pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:456b-28: sngags dang phyag rgya mi smad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:456b-29: lha rnams la yang ga la zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-3: mchod rnying lha yi grib ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-5: phyag rgya yi ge mtshan ma yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-6: gom pas bgom par mi bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-7: blun po dkon mchog gsum sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-8: sangs rgyas bstan la gnod byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-9: bla ma smod la brtson pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-10: mkhas pas bsgrims te gsad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-11: chos mi ldan dang bsreg pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-12: rtag tu sems can gnod brtson dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-13: dam tshig sdang rnam snying brtse bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-14: sngags pas sngags kyis gzhom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-15: 'jungs pa'i nor yang yang dag blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-16: sems can sdug bsngal can la sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-17: bla ma mchod pa'i rgyu mtshan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-18: de bzhin dam tshig sgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-19: dkyil 'khor don dang rgyal sras la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-20: mchod pa'i don phyir bsam pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-22: sems can rnams la phan dga' pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-23: dam tshig dang ni bla ma'i rdzas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-24: sems can rnams kyi srog bsrung phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-25: rtag tu brdzun ni smra bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-26: sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes bya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-27: dam tshig rnams ni bsrung bya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-28: sngags rig pa yi bsgrub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457a-29: gzhan gyis bud med kyang bsten bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-0: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug @457b pas; ;thams cad spyod cing kun byas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-2: snying rje ldan pas smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-3: de nas 'dis bka' yi dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta a'a dzny'a te d'a s+ya mi gri hna badzra su siddha ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-6: 'dis rdo rje lag tu byin la phrin las kyi dbang bskur sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-7: aom sarba karmma ni ku ru buddha n'am h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-8: de nas bla ma bla mar bya ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-9: khyod kyis lus mchog sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-10: rdzas dang nor dang 'bru rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-11: rta dang bzhon pa nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-12: bran gyi mchog dang khang pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-13: rgyal srid dbang phyug de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-14: bu dang bu mo chung ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-15: ma dang sring mo tsha mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-16: gzhan yang ci bzhed thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-17: phan pa'i bsam pas bla mar dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-18: de nas dngos grub sangs rgyas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-19: byang chub sgrub dang gzhan yang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-20: 'jig rten pa yi mthu chen rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-21: ji ltar 'dod pas gsol ba gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-22: de nas bu la phan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-23: sngags rig ser sna med sems dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-24: dad pas dad pa'i sems ldan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-25: dngos grub rnams ni sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-26: chos rnams rang bzhin med par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-27: sems kyis bsgom par byas nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-28: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-29: rang gi sa bon de dbus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-30: bsams nas dam tshig phyag rgya yang //
