K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:457b-31: bsam bzhin de bzhin de nyid kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458a-2: sgrub pa po yis yongs su bsgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458a-3: de nas rang gi sa bon dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458a-4: phyag rgyas phyag rgya de byin brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458a-5: gong 'og go rims ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458a-6: sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458a-7: de ltar nga rgyal bskyed nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458a-8: mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458a-10: dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458a-11: de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458a-20: gzhan yang dman pa phyag dar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458a-21: mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo'i gnas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458a-22: skye bo'i gnas kyi rigs su skyes pa dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa ji lta bur 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458a-24: tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458a-25: gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir zhus pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458a-29: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs shing dbang bskur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458a-32: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458b-0: mchod @458b pa byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458b-2: mdor na nga la yang de'i phan yon bshad par spro ba med de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458b-3: gang nga la bsod nams kyi phung po de brgya phrag stong du mar bsgyur yang grangs su yang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsod nams kyi phung po'i bar gyis kyang mi bzod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458b-7: gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458b-13: bdag cag rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs par zhugs spro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458b-14: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa spro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458b-15: de nas lha de dag gis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458b-17: 'dzambu'i gling ba'i sems can rnams bsod nams chung zhing tshe thung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458b-18: ngan song gi rgyud dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458b-21: byol song rnams su skyes pa dag kyang mchis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458b-23: de dag la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458b-25: de dag ni dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du chug cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458b-26: bcug nas kyang dbang bskur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458b-27: chos kyi yi ge yang zlos su chug cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458b-28: de nas sems can de dag tshe ring bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:458b-29: bsod nams dang bral ba bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459a-0: @459a *// ngan song las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459a-2: gang ngan song du skyes pa de dag gi ming la dbang bskur ba mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459a-3: gzugs brnyan la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459a-4: rang gi lha'i sku la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459a-5: tha na de dang rigs mthun pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459a-7: de dang rus mthun pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459a-9: bran la yang dbang bskur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459a-10: zhag bdun lan bdun dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur bas nges par ngan song gi sgrib pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459a-16: 'bum phrag brgya stong gi bar du bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459a-17: mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur na sdig pa chung du byas pa rnams lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459a-19: zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po tha ma dang; bar ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459a-23: de'i ming gis yungs kar dkar po rnams brgya phrag stong du bsregs na ngan song kun las thar bar 'gyur re //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459a-27: thal ba la sogs pa la cho ga de nyid kyis sdig pa kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-0: de yi dbus su 'khor @459b lo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-2: khor yug rdo rje rtse lnga ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-3: 'od zer dkar po dang ldan bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-4: de nas sna tshogs rdo rje bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-5: rdo rje rin chen chu skyes mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-6: de nas sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-7: phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-8: phyi rol rdo rje rigs rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-9: phyag rgya rnams ni phyir rol bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-10: gza' dang skar ma'i mtshan ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-12: gtso bo'i ri mo lugs ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-13: rdo rje can dang lhan cig bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-14: bum pa bum pa gang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-15: gtor ma lha bshos shin tu dkar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-16: mdor na thig ni btab nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-17: cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-18: dkar po'i gos ni gyon nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-19: sangs rgyas gzugs can mi 'jigs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-20: ngan song 'gro bar gnas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-21: sems can de rjes dran byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-22: sdig pa sgrib pa zhi ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-23: rgyud dag pa yi sbyin sreg ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-24: mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-25: 'bras yos yungs kar bsres pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-26: de yi rus pa sha la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-27: yang na ming tsam gyis kyang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-28: de nas bde 'gro skyes nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-29: mkhas pas rgyas par bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-30: khru do pa 'am khru bzhi ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-31: de bzhin mchog ni khru brgyad par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-32: byas nas thab khung khru bzhi ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-33: kun tu mu ran dang ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-34: de dbus padma rin chen can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-35: 'od zer ser po can bri zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:459b-36: khor yug tu ni rin chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-0: @460a *// mu ran la ni chu skyes bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-1: phyi rol tu ni rigs lnga yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-2: dbye bas phyag rgya bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-3: de bzhin phyi yi lha rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-4: lcags kyu la sogs bri bar bya; ;na bza' ser po gyon byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-5: mtho ris gnas pa rjes dran zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-6: de la phan phyir rgyas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-7: don du rgyas pa'i las byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-8: lus can de yi tshe dang dpal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-9: gzi brjid skal ba bzang po 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-10: de nas de la phan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-11: dbang du bya ba'i las bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-12: thab khung gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-13: khru gang pa 'am khru do ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-14: khru bzhi byas la de dbus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-15: chu skyes dmar po yang dag bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-16: de yi dbus su mda' bcas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-17: gzhu nyid kyang ni bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-18: khor yug tu ni mdar bcas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-19: gzhu ni kha dog dmar po bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-20: sngags 'dzin pa yis rtag par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-21: phyi rol de yi lha yi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-22: sems can de ni dran byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-23: na bz'a dmar po gyon pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-24: me tog dmar zhing padma yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-25: 'bras bu dmar dang khams bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-26: mar dang gur gum bsres pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-27: tsandan dmar po'i phye ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-28: sbyin sreg byas nas lha la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-29: thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-30: de yi gdon rnams rnam gzhom phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-31: mngon spyod yang dag brtsom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460a-32: khru do phyed bcas khru gsum mam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-0: de bzhin mchog ni khru @460b dgu pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-1: zur gsum dang ni ldan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-2: dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-3: rtse gsum pa yis mu ran bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-4: sna tshogs rdo rje yang byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-5: dbyug pa mgo dang rtse gsum rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-6: rdo rje dgra sta rtse gcig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-7: phyi rol du yang mtshan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-8: rig pa gsum pa sngar bzhin brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-9: bum pa gtor ma bum pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-10: zhal zas mang po gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-11: sha dang khrag gis bkang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-12: thod pa rnams kyang kun tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-13: de nas gos nag bgos shing khros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-14: rang nyid 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-15: lus can de yi sdig las sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-16: de nas de yi sdig bcom zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-17: bgegs dang bral te ci bde bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-18: mtho ris 'jig rten mi rnams nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-19: je snyed khams gsum 'jig rten spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-20: myur du go rims 'di nyid kyis; ;tshe 'dir gnas pa rnams la bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-21: de nas gang gi phyir byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-22: de yi phyir ni de bzhin 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-23: gzhan dag kyang ni las rnams kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-24: snga ma ji bzhin de bzhin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-25: des ni sems can rnams la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-27: de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams yang dag par dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:460b-29: gang ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461a-3: rigs kyi bu mo de bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461a-4: yang ji ltar bshad pa ma tshang ba med par bgyis pa lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461a-7: rgyal po'i blon po ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags rjes su slob pa de'i rgyal srid 'phel bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461a-11: 'khor gyi skye bo'i lo thog la sogs pa yang bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461a-17: bu mo rnams phun sum tshogs par yang bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461a-22: gang zhig brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di la dang pas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la brtags te grong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461a-23: grong khyer la sogs par 'jug pa bdag nyid kyis bsdu bar yang bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461a-24: glang po che'i steng du bzhag la grong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461a-25: grong khyer la sogs pa thams cad du bskor bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461a-26: dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461a-27: nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461a-28: sems can chen po de'i drung na bdag cag bran gyis tshul lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461a-29: bu'i tshul du gnas pa shes bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461b-0: gang na 'di @461b rab tu spyod pa de na bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rang nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461b-2: rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba de nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs su gzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461b-3: sa phyogs de yang mchod rten du gyur ba 'tshal bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461b-7: gang yang brtag pa'i rgyal po 'dir rab tu spyod pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub chen po de'i bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis g-yog bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461b-8: bran gyi tshul du gnas par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461b-9: mngag gzhug pa nyid du gnas par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461b-10: bsgo ba thams cad mnyan par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461b-13: dngos grub stsal bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461b-15: mdor na de'i rkang ba'i rdul mgo bos gzung bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461b-18: de'i phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461b-20: gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs te dbang bskur ba de kho bo cag gis mnga' bdag tu 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461b-21: phyag na rdo rjer 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:461b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-0: bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po lags @462a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-4: tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams gang chos la rim gro gcig gnyis byas pas de ltar yang dag pa'i dam bca' ni legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-8: snying po thams cad brtan par bya ba'i phyir rang gi snying po 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-9: aom bh'um drum badzra p'a ni dri thi tishtha h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-15: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-16: dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-17: dbus su rdo rje bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-18: yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-19: kun tu bzang po bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-20: spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-21: g-yas su phyag na rin chen spyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-22: phyag na padma nub phyogs bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-23: byang du phyag na sna tshogs bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-24: phyi rol du ni zlum por bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-25: sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-26: de yi phyi rol sems dpa' rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-27: go rims bzhin du bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-28: de yi phyi rol sems dpa' yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-29: byams pa la sogs mchog chen bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462a-30: de phyir de bzhin dge slong ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-0: kun dga' bo @462b sogs thub pa bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-1: rang gi chung ma bus bskor ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-2: tshangs pa la sogs phyi rol bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-3: gza' dang rgyu skar nyi zla dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-4: rgyal po bzhi bo rnams dad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-5: phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-7: phyir rol du ni dmyal ba sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-8: klu la sogs pa dud 'gro'i dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-9: sgo dang sgor ni de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-10: sgo skyong stobs kyi dam pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-11: dkar po 'dod pa'i nyi ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-13: gang bsngags nag po'i phyogs la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-15: lnga ba de rjes bdun pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-16: nya gang ba ni khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-17: sngags de phyag na padma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-18: dkyil 'khor bya ba'i cho ga la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-19: gang yang drag po'i las rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-20: de ni nag po la yang bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-21: khro bo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-22: zla ba nya ba khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-23: rgyal po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-24: gzhan yang rang gis 'dus byas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-25: dkyil 'khor la brtson gdab bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-26: shar nas 'char ba'i dbang bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-27: phyogs kyi cha ni brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-28: de nas dkyil 'khor dgod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-29: yid kyis yongs su brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-30: sngags dang rgyud ni dang por byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-31: 'jam zhing sngags gzugs dge zhing zhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-32: rjes mthun rang gi slob nyid kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-33: slob ma lhan cig tsam gyis spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:462b-34: de nas nang bar rab sngar langs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-2: blo ldan bla ma slob mar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-4: dkyil 'khor phyogs nyid shin tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-5: nye bar byugs shing legs par mnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-6: khro bo chen po bzlas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-7: dri yi chu yis bsangs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-8: dbus su rigs rnams snying po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-9: lhag par gnas par bya ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-10: dkyil 'khor gyi ni gtso bo yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-11: sngags kyi las rnams thams cad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-12: sa la sor ni bcu gnyis pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-13: dkyil 'khor dri yis byas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-14: dkyil 'khor rig pas lan bdun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-15: lhag pa de nas bzlas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-16: rdo rjes lha rnams nyid kyi yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-17: byang chub chen po zhes bya ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-18: snying pos skal ba ji lta bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-19: dri dang me tog sogs mchod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-20: byas nas gtor ma dbul bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-21: mngon par bsngags pa'i spos kyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-22: de nas tsandan la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-23: bsres pa'i chu la mngon par bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-24: de la dbul ba'i me tog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-25: bdug pa la yang cho ga bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-26: so shing au dum b'a ra dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-27: aa shvatha sogs rma med cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-28: shin tu phra min sbom pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-29: sor mo bcu gnyis tshad tsam ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-30: dri yi chu yis rab bkrus shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-31: me tog phreng ba yis kyang bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-32: dri bzangs la sogs byugs shing bdug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463a-33: lag pas reg na snying po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-0: mang po yang ni @463b bzlas bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-1: rigs nyid kyis ni lan bdun nam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-2: slob ma rnams kyis tshad gzhal bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-3: so shing la sogs yang dag gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-4: gcig la sogs pas go rims bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-5: rtse mo nyid nas bca' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-6: de nas mkhas pas bdag nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-7: slob ma srung ba brtan byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-8: sbyin sreg las ni mar byugs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-9: yam shing rnams ni mar dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-10: sbrang rtsi mar dang bsres pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-11: mar gyi sreg blugs bsreg bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-12: zho zan gyi yang sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-13: dang por bgegs ni zhi bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-14: de nas thugs kyis rjes 'dzin phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-15: de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-16: sdig pa zhi bar bya phyir ram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-17: de nas slob ma rnams brtags nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-18: cho ga yi ni lhag gnas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-19: de yis ji ltar nus pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-20: de bzhin sdom pa gzung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-21: de rnams cho ga 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-22: gtsang zhing dkar ba'i gos can ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-25: lhag par gnas par brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-26: bla mas dang por skyabs gsum sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-27: de yi rjes la byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-28: ma bskyed pa ni bskyed bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-29: bskyed pa slar yang rjes dran bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-30: de nas khro bo mngon bzlas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-31: chu yi spyi bor bsang gtor bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-32: mgo bor kun tu reg nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-33: mnyam par gzhag par lan bdun bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-34: rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:463b-35: lag pas dri bzangs spags pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-2: lan bdun rtag tu bzlas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-3: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-4: rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-5: rta mgrin chu skyes rigs la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-6: rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge bcu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-7: sumbha zhes bya rdo rje'i rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-8: rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-9: yi ge h'um bzhi rnams dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-10: las kun rab tu spros pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-11: rigs gsum rnams la thun mong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-12: khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-13: bgegs kun rnam par gzhom pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-14: gsang ba pa yi bdag pos gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-15: las ni thams cad pa yi sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-16: spyi bor reg cing bzlas de nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-17: bsang gtor yang bya de nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-18: bdug pa yis kyang bdug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-19: dbang bskur ba ni bum pa bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-20: 'bru la sogs pa thams cad ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-21: cung zad cung zad gang du blugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-22: rig pa'i rgyal pos mngon par bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-23: cho ga bzhin du lhag gnas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-24: dri yi chu yis mchod yon sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-25: me tog kyang ni gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-26: bdug pa yis kyang bdug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-27: dbang bskur ba ni bum pa bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-28: mkhas pas yang dag yongs su bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-29: de yis dbang bskur bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-30: slar yang bzlas pa dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-31: slob ma dam tshig can rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-32: thal mo sbyar zhing mngon phyogs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-33: de nas so shing sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464a-34: slob ma rnams ni go rims bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-0: gzung @464b shing shar du kha bltas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-1: phyi rol nyid du so shing bca'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-2: ma gas par ni 'chos nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-3: logs ma yin par 'dor bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-4: so shing mdun du dor byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-5: gang tshe mdun du rtse mo lhung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-6: de tshe dngos grub mchog shes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-7: gang zhig steng du bltas pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-8: de bzhin shar du rtse mo bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-9: dngos grub 'bring du yongs su grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-10: byang du bltas na thad ka nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-11: rig pa'i dngos grub 'jig rten pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-12: so shing dor ba brgya lam na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-13: gang tshe 'og tu kha bltas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-14: de tshe sa 'og dngos grub ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-16: slob ma nye bar reg pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-17: snga ma bzhin du gzung byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-18: thams cad las byed sngags kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-19: bla mas dri bzangs chu sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-20: re re la yang btung ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-21: khyor ba gsum ni sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-22: de nas blo ldan langs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-23: 'di dag kun tu spyad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-24: de nas mchod pa yang byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-25: lag pas spos ni bteg nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-26: blo ldan gus pas lha rnams lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-27: gsol ba gdab cing gus gnas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-28: dang por sngags ni snyan gsan dbab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-29: de yi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-30: de yi rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-31: lha rnams spyan 'dren pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-32: bcom ldan che ge mo zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-33: rig pa'i rgyal po khyod la 'dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-34: slob ma rnams la brtse phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:464b-35: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-2: bdag nyid kyang ni bri bar 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-3: bcom ldan de ni bdag gus la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-4: bka' drin mdzad par rigs lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-5: 'jig rten mgon po brtse ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-6: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-7: dgra bcom gang gzhan sngags kyi lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-8: lha dang 'jig rten skyong rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-10: sangs rgyas bstan la mngon dga' rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-11: bdag la yang dag dgongs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-12: che ge mo zhes bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-13: che ge mo yi dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-15: ji ltar gus pa'i nyer spyod kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-16: slob ma dang bcas bdag la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-17: rjes su brtse bas nyer gzung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-18: dkyil 'khor dang bcas thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-19: nye bar byon par mdzad par rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-20: de skad smras te tshig gang zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-22: bstod pa'i nyer spyod kyang byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-23: de dag gshegs su gsol bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-24: chags bral so sor ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-25: slob ma rnams la chos bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-26: blo ldan shar du mgo bstan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-27: dge ba'i gnyid kyi nyal du gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-28: de nas snga dro nyid du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-29: mtshan mo'i rmi lam mthong bar bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-30: gang tshe dge ba'am mi dge ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-31: dvogs med nyin par thos nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-32: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465a-33: rigs bdun rnams kyi dam tshig kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-0: de nas @465b bu khyod dam tshig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-1: sdom pa rgyal ba yis gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-2: dad pas bla ma'i bka' yang bskyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-3: khyed kyis srog chags gsang mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-4: ma byin mi blang 'dod log dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-6: chang mi btung zhing sha la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-7: bza' ba nam yang ma yin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-8: sems can kun la gnod mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-9: dkon mchog gsum yang mi spang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-10: dus rnams kun tu byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-11: snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-12: bla ma lha rnams de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-13: bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-15: de la phul ba'i rnying pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-16: grib ma la yang 'gom mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-17: phyag rgya'i rnam pa'ang de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-18: sngags dang lha la mi smad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-19: gdon gyi las rnams mi bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-20: mu stegs pa yang smad mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-21: mdor na bdag nyid the tshom dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-22: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-23: rgyud dang lha tshogs la de bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-24: dad pa brtan pas dam bcas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-25: sarba bid kyis dbang de bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-26: bum pa la sogs mchog rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-27: dbang bskur bcu po 'dod ji bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-28: de nas lag na rdo rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-29: dril bu sbyin bya de rjes la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-30: 'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-31: bzung nas 'khor los bsgyur ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-32: rgyal po dbang phyug thob phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:465b-33: sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang bskur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-2: rjes su gnang ba mnyan du gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-3: de nas bstod pas mgo bo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-5: bla ma la ni dbul bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-6: rin chen gter dang 'bru dang dbyigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-7: gser dang bzhon pa khyim dang gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-8: bu dang bu mo skyes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-9: bud med rnams ni dbul bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-10: grong dang grong khyer ci bzhed rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-11: rang gi sems ni rab dang bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-12: yon rnams nges par dbul bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-13: dngos grub myur phyir bla ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-14: mdor na bdag nyid kyang 'bul bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-15: tshe 'di'i bde ba ma lus dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-16: 'jig rten pha rol bde ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-18: lha yi bde ba lta ci smos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-19: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-20: rdo rje slob dpon smod pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-21: de yis rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-22: de phyir slob dpon smad mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-23: rdo rje spun dang sring mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-24: gang yang smad par mi bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-26: dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-27: bla ma smod byed ma rungs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-28: dam tshig 'das la bzod mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-29: de lta bu sogs gnod byed la'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-30: de lta nyid do de byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-31: kun rig gis gsungs dngos grub 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466a-32: sems can kun la rjes brtse bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466b-0: de nas bcom @466b ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466b-1: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466b-2: bde ba'i don du sgrub pa'i cho ga gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466b-3: bri gzhi la bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa de kho na bzhin du bri zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466b-4: g-yas su de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466b-5: g-yon du sh'akya thub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466b-6: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku mdog zla ba lta bu phyag na padma can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466b-7: sh'akya thub pa'i 'og na phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466b-8: de dag gi dngus su sman pa'i rgyal po phyag gcig gis aa ru ra'i 'bras bu bsnams shing de las gzhan ni mchog sbyin du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466b-10: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba ma rungs pa 'joms pa la brtson pa dag ni rang gi lha la mngon par phyogs par bri zhing de dag gi dbus su lo tsa n'a dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466b-13: sgrol ma dag phyag na rang gi mtshan ma can bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466b-14: de rnams kyi 'og tu rdzing bu chu srin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466b-17: sbal pa dkar po la sogs pa dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466b-18: chu las skyes pa'i me tog du mas yongs su gang bar bri zhing 'dug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:466b-24: 'bras bu rnams pa sna tshogs bri par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-1: sgrub pa po thal mo sbyar te rab tu 'dug cing 'dus par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-2: de nas de rdzogs pa la byin gyis brlab pa dmigs par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-3: spyan dbye ba byas nas mchod pas mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-4: de nas gal te mtshan ma mthong na myur du 'grub po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-5: gal te ma mthong na ring mo zhig na 'grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-6: bzhad pa dang ni rnga sgra dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-7: dril bu'i sgra dang 'brug sgra nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-8: dge slong bram ze bu mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-9: 'bras bu mthong na dngos grub ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-11: de nas sku gzugs phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-12: sngags rnams kyis ni bya ni gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-13: ji ltar bskyed pas thob bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-14: 'jig rten gsum ni rnam rgyal kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-15: bdag bsrung la sogs byas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-16: bdag gi de nyid kyang bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-17: ji srid dngos grub rtags 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-19: de nas dbang pa'i gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-20: sngags kyang chad lhag bskang bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-21: brgya phrag brgyad rnams bzlas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-22: de nas bzlas pa de yi mthar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-23: dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-24: mchod pa rgya chen yang byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-25: mtshan mo gcig ni bzlas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-26: de nas gal te gtso bo 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-27: sras sam lha rnams mthong gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-28: de tshe snod 'dod ji ltar bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467a-29: dngos grub mchog ni gsol ba gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-0: @467b lha rnams rtag tu dgyes pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-1: dngos grub 'bras bu de la stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-2: phyag byas nas ni dngos grub ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-3: mchog la sogs pa blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-4: bla ma dkon mchog gsum po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-5: rang rang skal pa phul nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-6: de nas rtag tu bdag nyid sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-7: de rnams med na shes rab can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-8: blangs nas rang nyid spyad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-9: sems can kun la phan btson zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-10: skal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-11: legs par bsgrubs na thams cad byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-12: gnod sbyin sgyu sgar gdong la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-13: tshig tsam gyis ni bran bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-14: zhi ba'i las la sogs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-15: thams cad byed par 'gyur ba yin ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-18: sems can sdig pa bgyis pa dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams kyis dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu spang ba'i phyir ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-21: dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa chen po byed pa de rnams dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams las tshegs med par grol bar 'gyur ba de nyid de bzhin du nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-22: de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:467b-23: brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzlas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-0: bum pa rnams ni snga ma @468a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-2: dbang bskur ba ni brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-3: de nas sngon gyi sdig byang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-4: dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-5: kun las myur du rnam grol 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-6: sdig las rnam grol bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-7: de yang gnas gtsang lhar skyes nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-8: rtag tu sangs rgyas chos pa gro thos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-9: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-10: rim gyis byang chub mngon sum byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-11: de yi gzugs brnyan dang ni ming //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-12: gur gum gyis ni bris nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-13: ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs chen las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-14: sems can rnams ni thar pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-15: sngags pa gzhan la phan brtson zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-16: brtse bas mngon par dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-17: de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-18: sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang skur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-19: lha yi gzugs su brtags nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-20: mchod rten dbus su bzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-21: rang gzhan lha yi snying po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-22: snying ga de yi phyogs bris nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-23: lha mnyam par ni sems bskyed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-24: khyim du yang ni gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-25: de yi ming dang spel ba'i sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-26: gur gum bzang pos bris nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-27: 'bum ni yongs su rdzogs par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-28: mchod rten las ni rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-29: sdig chen sdig ni zad bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-30: bye ba yang ni rdzogs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-31: de ltar byas na de nges par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-32: dmyal ba las ni grol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468a-33: de bzhin yi dvags byol song las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-0: grol te lha rigs @468b rnams su skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-1: de yi ming dang spel nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-2: ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags stong bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-3: gal te brgya phrag stong yang tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-4: byed ba'i bar du rdzogs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-5: lha'i rigs rnams su skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-6: de yi ming nas spel ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-8: yang na brgya phrag stong snyed du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-9: spyin sreg byas na dmyal ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-10: chen po'i sdig pa las grol 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-11: ji srid mtshan ma 'par ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-12: gnas su yang dag skye par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-13: yungs kar dkar po'i til dang 'bras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-14: ra yi 'o ma yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-15: de bskus yam shing de srid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-16: cho ga ji bzhin sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-17: de nas de ni nges par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-18: lha rigs rnams su skyes pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-20: gal te lha yi mchog skyes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-21: yang na thab khung nang du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-22: dkar po g-yas bskor 'bar ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-23: gyen du 'greng zhing dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-25: glog bzhin dri ma med 'od brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-27: yang na me lha bdag nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-28: de bzhin kho nar ston 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-29: zla ba bzhin du dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-31: mtshan ma 'di dag mthong ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-32: de nas dmyal sogs rnams grol zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-33: sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-34: skyes pa yin par shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:468b-35: khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-0: cho ga ji bzhin thab khung @469a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-2: rdo rjes mtha' ma bskor ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-3: 'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-4: rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-5: ji bzhin rang gi phyogs su bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-6: ji bzhin sems dpa' rnams dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-7: 'jig rten la sogs phyin nas bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-8: de nas bum pa gang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-9: gtor ma brgyan rnams bkang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-10: brgyad dam bcu drug dag tu gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-11: bza' dang bca' ba zhal bras dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-12: me tog phreng sogs de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-13: bla re rgyal mtshan dar la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-14: gdugs mchog rnams kyi legs par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-15: de ltar sbyin sreg thab khung ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-16: mchog tu yang dag sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-17: cho ga shes par de bris nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-18: lha yi tshogs ni spyan drangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-19: sngags shes pas sngags phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-20: aarga la sogs phul nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-21: mdor bsdus mchod par byas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-22: lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-23: ga bur gur gum la sogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-24: mar dang 'o ma til bsgos la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-25: til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-26: dri yi chus ni legs bkang ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-27: 'bras chen spos dang la du dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-28: sbrang rtsi sha ka rar ldan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-29: brgya phrag du mar yongs su bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-30: yam shing la yang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-31: rang gi sngags kyis btab pa'i shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-32: khung bu'i nang du gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-33: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-34: dri za sogs su gnas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469a-35: ro la sngags kyis btab nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-0: chu mchog @469b gis ni bkrus nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-1: sngags bzlas dri yis byug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-2: gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-3: sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-4: me tog phreng ba la sogs mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-5: gtsug phud dpung par de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-6: sngags bris na ni gdags par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-7: snying ga mgrin pa kha phyogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-8: sarba bid+y'as byin gyis brlab sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-9: dpral ba mdzod spu rna ba gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-10: mgo bo spyi gtsug dpung pa gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-11: rna ba dku dang pus mo bol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-12: sna yi rtse mo long bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-13: mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-14: dbang po rnams kyi gnas dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-15: de ltar gzhan du'ang gnas yi ge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-16: mchog tu dge ba de dag gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-17: de dag ngan song yongs sbyangs phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-18: stan dang bcas te thab dbus gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-19: de nas sngags pas sngags kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-20: mngon par bsngags pa'i gos kyis g-yogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-21: de nas byin za yang dag rab sbar la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-22: me lce stong gis dkrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-23: zla ba kunda bzhin du zhi ba'i yid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-24: dpag med kun la mchod yon yongs su brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-25: de bzhin ji ltar gsungs pa'i mchod pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-26: de nas dang po de yi sbyin sreg ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-27: rdzogs par byas zhing 'bar ba nyid la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-28: yongs su brtags pa nas ni rgyal ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-29: sogs pa rnams kyi brgyad ni lhag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:469b-30: bcas pa'i brgya ni yongs su brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-0: de nas sbyong ba'i sngags kyi @470a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-2: bsreg bya nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-3: de nas zhal ras dkar po sbyar drangs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-4: yo byad rnams sam mchod yon sogs gsum mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-5: phyag na rdo rje padma zhags pa bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-6: rgyan rnams thams cad kyis ni rab brgyan cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-7: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi dbu rgyan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-8: bsam par bya zhing yang ni bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-9: de yi snying po brgya phyag stong ngam ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-10: ji srid bye ba'i bar du sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-11: yang na mtshan ma yang dag byung na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-12: de bzhin sdig rgyun spangs par shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-13: de nas thal bar 'gyur ba cho ga bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-14: rdo rje bsdu bas thal ba rus pa bsdu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-15: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dri chu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-16: ba yi rnam lnga pa bcas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-17: sbyong ba'i sngags ni 'bum bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-18: gong bu byas nas ga bur drir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-19: sa dang legs par bsres byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-20: sku gzugs mchod rten lhar bsam zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-21: lan gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-22: yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-23: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-24: 'bum phrag gnyis ni bzlas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-25: de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-26: yang na sku gzugs zhal 'dzum mam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-27: de spos ngad ldan 'od snang ngam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-28: lha la sogs pa sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470a-30: me tog la sogs 'dor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-0: dung dang rnga dang @470b gling bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-1: pi wang la sogs sgra thos 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-2: gal te lha yi mtshan ma de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-3: sdig mang nyid kyis ma mthong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-4: de tshe 'bum phrag brgya stong bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-5: ji srid mtshan ma byung bar du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-7: mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas par byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-8: de mthar cho ga shes par yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-9: mtshan gcig thog thag mi nyal bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-10: de nas de yi [?] sdig pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-11: rnam dag bdag nyid nges par mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-12: lha yi lus kyis gzugs dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-13: de yi rgyud du ngo shes 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-14: mtshan ma 'di dag shes nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-15: rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-16: byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-17: las rnams thams cad rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-18: gal te de yang med gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-19: de tshe bzlas bsgom tshul gyis phya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-20: de yi ming tsam bris nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-21: mchod rten phreng ba bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-22: sku gzugs kyang ni byas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-23: sbyin sreg dbang bskur byas gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-24: gdon mi za bar bde 'gror skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-25: thal ba yungs kar bye ma sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-26: mi spel sngags ni mngon btab nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-27: rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung dor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-28: de ltar byas na sdig pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-29: yin yang ngan song rnams la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-30: rnam par thar par gyur nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-31: dge ba [?] mchog gi sa pon ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-32: bskyed dang ldan pas sangs rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-33: 'bras bur yang dag ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-34: sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:470b-35: brtson 'grub bsam gtan shes rab rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-0: @471a *// rab tu bsgoms pa'i bsod nams ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-1: 'jig rten ngan song bcom pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-2: 'di ltar lha yang ci zhig smos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-3: 'di la the tshom med pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-4: gang yang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-5: gang yang med pa'i lta ba can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-6: gang byang chub kyi lam las rnam par 'das pa'i bstan pa la zhe sdang gis gnod pa byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-7: sdig pa'i rang bzhin mi shes pa pha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-8: ma la sems mi brtse ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-9: byang chub kyi sems la mi brten pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-10: 'dod chags dang bral ba bsad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-16: phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs pa rnams la med pa nyid du lta ba la sogs pa'i sdig pa can rnams la de lta bu'i shes rab dang thabs med na grol ba med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-17: zhes pa bde bar gshegs pa rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-18: de nas brgya byin la sogs pa spyan padma rgyas pa rnams legs so zhes bya bas mnyes par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-19: mnyes par mdzad nas mchod pa mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-21: gzhan la phan par brtson pas kyang ji ltar bka' stsal ba bzhin du byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-22: 'bras bu de bzhin du thob par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-23: dbang ldan du mgrin pa sngon po glang khyu mchog la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471a-24: sku mdog dkar po phyag bzhi pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-0: gnyis pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang @471b mchog sbyin du bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-1: g-yon pa'i gcig gis rtse gsum pa 'dzin cing gnyis pas ral gri 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-2: sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-3: aom pa shu pa ti n'i la kansha au ma pr'i ya sv'a h'a zhes pa 'dis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-4: de nas phyag rgya 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-5: lag pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la mthe'u chung mthe bong gis mnan te sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas shing ming med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-6: mdzub mo yang rdo rje'i rnam par chung zad mdud par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-7: 'di ni phyags bdag gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-9: mdog nag po phyag bzhi pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-10: phyag g-yas pa dag na dbyug to dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-11: rdo rje 'dzin cing g-yon pa dag na dung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-13: gser gyi rdo rje ma khyab 'jug lta bu gser gyi mdog can du shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-14: rdo rje dril bu rma bya la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-16: dmar po g-yas pa dag na shakti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-18: g-yon pa dag na khyim bya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-20: rdo rje gzhon nu ma rdo rje dril bu lta bur shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-21: mi smra ba rdo rje dang pa la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-25: phyag g-yas pa dag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-27: g-yon pa dag na dbyug tho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-29: rdo rje zhi ba ma tshangs pa lta bur shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-30: rdo rje mtshon cha glang po che dkar po la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:471b-31: phyag g-yon pas rang gi rdo rje 'dzin cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-2: rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje mtshon cha ltar shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-3: rdo rje 'khyil ba khro bo yang shing rta la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-4: mdog dmar po g-yas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-7: rdo rje bdud rtsi ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-8: rdo rje 'khyil pa khro bo lta bu nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-9: rdo rje 'od zer khro bo dkar po dang pa la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-13: rdo rje 'od zer ma rdo rje khro bo lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-14: rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo rus sbal la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-15: mdog sngon po phyag g-yas na rdo rje 'dzin cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-17: dbyug pa rdo rje mchog ma rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-18: rdo rje dmar ser khro bo glang po che la zhon pa mdog dmar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-19: phyag g-yas na rdo rje 'dzin cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-20: g-yon pas mi bzung nas za zhing gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-21: rdo rje ske rags ma rdo rje dmar ser khro bo lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-22: rdo rje tshogs bdag glang sna glang po che la zhon pa can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-23: phyag g-yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-24: g-yon pas gshol 'dzin cing gnas pa mdog dkar po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-25: rdo rje 'dul ba ma rdo rje glang sna lta bu 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-26: 'di ni khyad par te gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-27: phyag g-yon gyis kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-28: rdo rje phreng ba tshogs kyi bdag po mdog ldang gu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-29: bya ku li ka'i shing rta la zhon pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-30: phyag g-yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472a-31: g-yon pas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-0: @472b rdo rje gdan ma rdo rje phreng ba lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-1: 'di ni khyad par te gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-3: rdo rje dbang can ne tso'i shing rta la zhon pa mdog dkar ser /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-4: phyag g-yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-5: g-yon pas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-6: rdo rje dbang can ma rdo rje dbang can lta bu ste 'di ni khyad par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-9: rnam rgyal rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag po sbal pa la zhon pa mdog dkar po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-10: phyag g-yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-12: rdo rje gdengs pa ma rnam rgyal rdo rje lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-13: rdo rje gtun shing pho nya mo me tog gi shing rta'i khang bu la zhon pa mdog dkar ser /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-14: phyag g-yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-16: rdo rje gtun shing pho nya mo rdo rje gtun shing lta bu ste 'di ni khyad par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-18: g-yon gyis kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-19: rdo rje rlung gi pho nya mdog sngon po'i ri dvags la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-20: phyag g-yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-23: mgyogs pa'i rdo rje ma rdo rje rlung gi pho nya lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-24: rdo rje me'i pho nya mo ra stes la zhon pa mdog dmar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-25: g-yen du 'bar ba'i 'od rtse gsum pa 'bar ba'i phyag g-yas pa dag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-27: g-yon pa dag na dbyug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-29: rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje me lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:472b-30: rdo rje 'jigs byed po nya sngon po ro langs la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-3: rdo rje gtsigs pa pho nya mo rdo rje 'jigs byed lta bu ste 'di ni khyad par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-6: rdo rje lcags kyu bran klu lhag pa la zhon pa sngon po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-7: phag gi gdong pa can g-yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-9: rdo rje nag po bra na mo ro langs kyi zhon pa can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-10: phyag g-yon gyis kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-11: phyag g-yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-13: rdo rje log 'dren phran bra ba byi ba la zhon pa mdog dkar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-14: glang po che'i gdong pa can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-15: phyag g-yas dag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-17: g-yon dag na rtse gsum dang ni dbyug pa 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-18: sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-19: rdo rje srul mo bran mo mdog sngon mo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-20: g-yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa g-yon pa phyags ma 'dzin pa bra ba byi ba la zhon pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-21: klu rdo rje'i chu srin zhon pa dang gdengs ka brgyad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-22: mdog dkar po g-yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-23: g-yon pa klu'i zhags pa'i 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-24: rdo rje chu srin ma bran mo chu srin la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-25: mdog dkar po gdengs ka brgyad ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-27: g-yon pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i chu srin 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-28: 'jigs mdog ma ljang gu g-yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473a-29: g-yon pas ral gri be ta ka 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-0: dpal mo mdog dkar ser g-yas @473b pas rdo rje 'dzin cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-2: dbyangs can ma mdog dkar mo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-3: phyag g-yon pas pi wang dang g-yas pas rdo rje ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-4: bgrod ka mdeg ljang gu sengge la zhon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-5: phyag g-yas pa dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-6: g-yon pa dag na lde men dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-8: drag po la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-9: chu bdag gi mthar thug pa rnams kyi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-10: gang phyag g-yas su rdo rje gsungs pa de ni rdo rje rtse gsum par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-12: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams cad rnam par snang mdzad la mngon du bltas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-13: de nas thun mtshams kyi dus su rdo rje ti rin ti ris dag par bcings te me tog sngon po'i phreng ba bzung la dkyil 'khor du 'jug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-14: yi ge h'um bzhi pa brjod cing rdo rjes rnam par snang mdzad la skor ba bdun dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-16: dril bu'i sgra bsgrags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-17: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi yang lhag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-18: chad pa'i nyes bzhi bar bya ba'i nges par bltas te phreng ba bcom ldan 'das la phul nas rdo rje'i gar byas la blangs te yi ge h'um bzhi pa nyid kyis rang gi mgo bor bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-19: ji ltar cho ga bzhin du yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-20: gang zhig chad pa yongs su bskang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-21: mkhas pas lhag pa rnam spang phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-22: rdo rje dril bu kun tog bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-25: de nas 'dug par gyur pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:473b-26: rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-1: rje sgo ni bzhi po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-2: yid kyi dbye bar bya ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-3: aom badzro tagha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha h'um zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-5: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gshibs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-6: mdzub mo gan rkyal yang dag gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-7: legs par drag tu rnam par dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-8: sgo dbye ba yi cho ga yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-10: de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas las rnams byas la rin po che bdun las byas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-11: sa las byas pa'i bum pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-12: nag po la sogs pa med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-16: lha rdzas kyi dri'i chu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-19: 'bru thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-20: yal 'dab dang bcas pa mgrin pa la gos dam pas legs par bcings la bsrung ba byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-21: phyi rol kun tu lha rdzas kyi dri rjes su byugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-22: me tog gi phreng ba btags pa'i rdo rjes steng du mtshan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-23: rdo rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-24: khro bo ti rin ti ris yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje dang me tog gi yal 'dab kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-25: aom badzra au da ka h'um zhes bya ba 'di stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i yi ge h'um bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474a-26: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi spyan sngar legs par bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-0: 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'i phyi rol du bum pa gnyis pa la yi ge h'um bzhi pa @474b brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-1: de'i chus bdag nyid dang slob ma dbang bskur ba bya ste gzhug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas sam ma bcings pa yang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-2: byu ru de bzhin sa le spram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-3: dung dang de bzhin nor bu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-4: rin chen kun te sing ghri dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-5: by'a ghr'i gi ri be be ri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-6: sman kun til nas sran ma sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-7: 'bras dang gro ni lnga pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-8: sman lnga 'bru kun sgras mtshon pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-9: de'i rjes la phyag rgya bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sdom pa 'dzin du bcug nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gos sngon po la yang yongs su bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-10: sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyis gtsug tor bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-11: sgo skyong gis gdong bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-12: rdo rje go chas stod g-yogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-13: gtsug tor la sogs pa can gyis slob dpon gyis khro bo ti rin ti ris me tog sngon po'i phreng ba bzung nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-14: aom badzra ma ya ma pra be sh'a mi zhes brjod cing zhugs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-15: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-16: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs nas bdag nyid 'jug par byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-17: phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor la rang rang gi mgo la bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-19: ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor la bltas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:474b-20: tishtha badzra zhes pa la sogs pas gzhug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol ba yang byas la chu'i dbang bskur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475a-5: bdag po la sogs pas dbang bskur ba dgu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas blangs pa de kho na nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475a-9: rdo rje brtul zhugs kyang bzung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475a-10: me tog la sogs pas kyang bdag nyid legs par mchod de tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475a-11: yi ge h'um gis gzengs bstod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475a-12: lung bstan pa yang smos la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475a-13: slar yang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pa yang ste h'um k'a ra badzra ham zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475a-14: rang gi mtshan brjod par bya zhing rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475a-15: de'i sngags aa: 'i rnam pa'i mtha' can gyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475a-16: badzro ham zhes bya ba yis rdo rje'i nga rgyal rnam par bsgoms la de rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475a-17: badzra dh'a tu aa ham zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475a-18: de ltar rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la byang gi sgor de'i sngags aa:'i rnam pa'i mtha' can gyi rdo rje dril bu bdag nyid dbab pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-0: badzra ghando ham zhes pa'i nga rgyal bskyed la de badzra a'a be sha kro dho ham zhes bsgom @475b mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-1: de lta bu'i rdo rjer bsgrub pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-2: de nas yang rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyus bcings la se gol legs par gtogs par byed cing sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-3: aom badzra sa m'a ya dza: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-4: de nas myur du phyag rgya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-5: rdo rje khro bo dam tshig brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-6: de ma thag tu mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-7: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i rang gi sgo nas spyan drangs la bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-8: bcings nas dbang du byas la ji lta ba bzhin du yi ge h'um bzhi pas mchod yon phul te dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-9: bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa rnams bsgrubs te rang gi sngags brjod pa ji lta bur brjod cing dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam aa ham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-10: de nas rang gi sngags brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-12: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dbyung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-13: rdo rje las gsang dam pa byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-14: dam tshig mchog rnams nyid du grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-15: khro bo'i bcing ba bla med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-16: de rnams bcing bar rab bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-17: lag par rdo rje kun tu bsnol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-18: mthe chung lcags kyu bcing ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-19: mdzub mo dag ni rab tu brkyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-20: 'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:475b-21: de bzhin mdzub mo kha sprad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-2: bsnyams la dbu ma padma nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-3: gung mo mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-4: sdigs mdzub gnyis ni rdo rje yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-5: g-yas pa bkug pa lcags kyu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-6: de dag nyid sbyar yi ge h'um//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-7: legs pa'i rnam pa de bzhin yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-8: mdzub gnyis logs gnas khro gnyer du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-9: snying gar nyi ma mdzub gnyis zlum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-10: lag pa mgo bor rab tu brkyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-11: mdzub mo kha ru dgod pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-12: mdzub mo sen mo kun tu rig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-13: g-yas pa mdzod kyi khu tshur yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-14: gung mo'i mgo bcas 'khor lo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-15: kha las rab mchog mthon pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-16: mdzub mo dbu ma rdo rje yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-17: mdzub mo mgrin pa bskor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-18: mdzub mo lhag ma mche ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-19: rdo rje khu tshur mthe bong bsdam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-20: sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams ni rdo rje dbyings su bshad pa bzhin du bya ba 'di lta ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-21: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-22: snying gar yang na mthe bong mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-23: legs par rab brkyang phreng ba ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-24: thal mo sbyar mchog kha nas dbyung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-25: gar las sbyi por thal mo sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-26: rdo rje bsdams pa thur du sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-27: thal mo legs sbyar gyen du gtor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-28: mthe bong bsnyams te nges par bsnyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-29: rab tu brkyang ba byug pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-30: mdzub mo gcig ni bkug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476a-31: mthe bong gnyis ni mdud pa bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476b-0: mthe @476b bong mdzub mo bsnol ba bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476b-1: rdo rje khu tshur mchog bsdams nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476b-3: snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par bsams la h'um gi rnams pa nyid brjod cing phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476b-4: de nas phyag rgya'i nges par 'byung ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476b-5: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476b-10: las kyi h'um mdzad kyi gnas su yang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476b-11: de nas rin chen h'um mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi sdags rnams 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476b-12: aom bdzra bhri ku ti kro dha a'a na ya sarba ratn ni hr'i: h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476b-13: aom bdzra hr'i: shti krodha dushta m'a ra ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476b-14: aom bdzra bi shva kro dha ku ru sarb bi shva ru p'a ya s'a dha ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476b-15: phyag rgya gzhan rnams ni sems dpa' rdo rje ma nas brtsams par blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476b-16: de nyid kyi phyir rig pa thams cad kyi mchog rnams kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags su bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476b-17: rdo rje h'um mdzad dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya bsdu bas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad bklag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476b-18: gzhan rnams rdo rje h'um mdzad du 'gyur ba rigs pa yang ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476b-19: rgyud thams cad du h'um mdzad nges par bstan pa yang ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476b-20: de'i rjes su de kho na bzhin lce la rdo rje bskod de rim pa bzhin du sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i chos kyi yi ge rnams dgod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:476b-22: h'um yig sangs rgyas rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-2: hr'i: yig rnam pa rdo rje'i sde'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-3: a'a: yig rdo rje sna tshogs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-4: h'um sems dpa' rdo rje'i ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-5: tr'i rin chen rdo rje ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-6: hr'i: chos kyi rdo rje ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-7: aa: las kyi rdo rje'i ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-12: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dga' ba chen po la h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-14: rna ba bde ba la h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-15: mchod pa thams cad la h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-16: rab tu dga' ba la h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-18: legs par gzi mchog la h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-22: hi spho ta bam h'uzm ghant aa aa: h'um rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-23: de ma thag tu aa: 'i yi ge las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-24: snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed pa las kyi phyag rgya bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-25: de la khro bo'i khu tshur rnam par gnyis byas pa la g-yon pa'i rdo rje sor mo g-yas pa bzung zhing bsgreng ba byang chub mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu ster ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-26: gnyis po de dag gis 'gying ba dang bcas pas gsal bar byed pa ni rdo rje h'um mdzad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-28: sems dpa' rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-29: lcags kyu 'dzin par yang dag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-30: mda' gsor ba yi sbyor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477a-31: legs so zhes bya snying gar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-0: rdo rje gnyis nyid dbang bskur @477b ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-4: rin chen rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-5: snying gar nyi ma rab tu blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-6: g-yon gnas lag ngar dbyug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-7: de bzhin 'di ni yongs su bzlog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-8: g-yas dang g-yas min rnam par bsnol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-11: chos kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-12: snying gar nyi ma la ral gri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-13: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-14: rdo rje gnyis ni khar gnas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-15: rdo rje'i gar ni bgrol bas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-16: 'gram pa spyi gtsug yang dag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-18: rdo rje las dang; las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-19: go cha mthe chung mche ba mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-20: khu tshur gnyis ni nges par bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-21: rdo rje 'gyings pa'i rab sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-22: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-23: phreng ba bcings te kha nas dbyung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-24: gar las spyi bor thal mo sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-26: mthe bo bsnyams te nges par gshibs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-27: dri byug pa yi sbyor ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-28: mchod pa'i phyag rgya rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-29: mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-30: mthe chung las ni lcags kyu che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-31: mkhrig ma mdud pa mchog dag bsnol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-32: rgyab dag kyang ni nges par gshibs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-33: zhes sgo skyong rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:477b-34: las kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyang gar las 'byung ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478a-0: de nas rnam par snang mdzad pa sogs pa rnams kyi bcing @478a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478a-5: las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi yang ste rdo rje dang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478a-6: mthar gnas pa'i skyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478a-7: bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa de rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478a-8: gang gi phyag rgya gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478a-9: gang yin pa rnams bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478a-10: thams cad kyi phyag rgya dam tshig phyag rgya yang yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478a-11: g-yon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gan rgyal du byas la lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478a-13: mthe chung nas brtsams te kha phye ba'i thal mo kha sbyar ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478a-14: 'di ni byams pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478a-15: de rnams kyi rig pa ni sngar bshad pa nyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478a-16: de rnams kyi rig pa ljags rnams la dgod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478a-17: 'di ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478a-18: yi ge aa las rang gi thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la de rnams 'dri bya'i rjes su 'brangs nas phyag rgya chen po bcings pa ni las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478a-19: rang gi thugs kar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la dri bya'i rjes su 'brangs pa nyid las de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478a-20: de nyid kyis kyang rig pa'i thun mong pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-0: mthe bong bcings nas kyang g-yon pa'i sor mo dbus ma gsum po rtse gsum pa la dbus ma rtse mo yang rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung zhing rdo rje'i rig pa mchog @478b 'di ni rdo rje'i dpal zhes grags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-1: de las gzhan ni rab bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-2: sgyu ma rdo rje sogs ming can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-3: rdo rje bsdams pa brtan byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-4: g-yon pa rdo rje yang bcing bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-5: rdo rje khu tshur zhes grags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-6: rdo rje'i rigs rnams kun la 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-7: rdo rje rnam gnyis dang yang byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-8: mtshan ma thams cad bkod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-9: rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi //
