K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-10: phyag rgya rnams su'ang dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-11: mdun dang rgyab gnas rab tu brkyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-12: mthe bong rgan po 'dzin pa chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-13: aom gyi rnam pa sbyi bor gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-14: rdo rje shugs kyis rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-16: phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-17: lag pa'i mdun nyid rab tu brkyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-18: lag pa'i mdun yang de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-19: lag pa gnyis kyang khu tshur gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-20: kha las yongs su bskor ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-21: rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-22: g-yon pa'i mthe bo legs gnas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-23: phreng ba 'dzin pa nges rgyal nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-24: g-yas pas nor ni sbyin pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-25: ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur khor [?]//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-26: tshogs kyi bdag po chen po'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-27: g-yas pa gshol ni gzung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-28: de bzhin lag pa rab tu brkyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-29: g-yas pas 'bar ba kun du ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-30: rdo rje khu tshur rab tu 'dar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-31: pho nya chen po'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-32: bsnyems bcas kha dang mche ba rtse //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-33: byugs pas 'joms pa rab tu sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:478b-34: lag pa bskum pa sbyar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-2: bran gyi phyag rgya'i tshogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-3: de nas au ma la sogs pa ma mo'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya 'byung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-4: g-yos pa rdo rje bsdams pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-5: rtse gsum mtshan ma bcing bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-6: 'di bcing ba yi yang dag pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-7: dngos grub rig pa mchog rang nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-8: rdo rje'i rigs rnams thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-9: g-yon pa rdo rje mchog bsrungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-10: cho ga ji bzhin dam tshig gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-11: phyag rgya bcing bar rab bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-12: 'khor lo thams cad mchog kun bsdam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-13: de bzhin bu yi phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-14: aom yig phyag rgya'ang de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-15: yi ge rna can yongs su gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-16: phyag rgya mdzes pa can dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-17: 'bar ba yongs su gzung ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-18: 'od zer bsdus pa kho na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-19: dbyug pa khu tshur gzung ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-20: khams yongs su bskor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-21: khro bo'i dam tshig gdengs ka yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-22: phyag rgya phreng ba rdo rje bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-23: ming med spyi bor gnas pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-24: rtsibs can dkyil 'khor bzhin du bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-25: 'od can rtsibs can dam tshig rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-26: lag ngar bskum zhing kha phyogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-27: rgyab nas yongs su bskor ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-29: mdun du dul bar gnas pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-30: pho nya'i dam tshig rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-31: gnyis mthar zhugs pa rtse mo sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-32: bcings pa nyid dang rab ltung byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479a-33: lag ngar bsnol dang ma bsnol dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479b-1: bran mo rnams kyi dam tshig yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479b-2: de nas lha chen po la sogs pa'i ljags rnams la sngags bkod la yi ge aa las rang gi snying gar de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed la de rnams kyi phyag rgya bcings te las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479b-3: rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms la phyag rgya chen po bri bya'i rjes su 'brangs te bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479b-5: bskal pa bzang po ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479b-6: phyi rol rdo rje'i rigs rnams la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ma dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs gsangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479b-8: dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479b-9: de nas mchod yon phul la mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479b-10: de nas rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi bum par sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can rdo rje la sogs rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa rnams par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa rnams phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du dgod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479b-11: bum pa gang ba rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479b-18: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bla re dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479b-19: zur bzhir rnam par bkra ba'i ba dan bcings pa'i gdugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479b-21: ba dan rnams kyang yi ge aom dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:479b-22: dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad yongs su bzlas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480a-0: @480a *// badzra spha ra na kham zhes pa 'dis lha thams cad la nges par dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480a-1: me tog gi shing brgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480a-4: me togthams cad la rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480a-5: aom badzra pushpe h'um zhes pas me tog gi phyag rgya mngon par bsngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480a-8: dri ma med pa'i dri bzang po rnams la de kho na bzhin du rdo rje me dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480a-9: aom badzra gha mdhe zhes pa 'di dri'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa yis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480a-13: tsandan la sogs pa legs par bsres la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480a-14: de kho na bzhin du rdo rje me dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480a-15: aom badzra dhu be h'um zhes pa 'dis bdug pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas spos phor 'bum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480a-24: sgron ma thams cad sgron ma'i sdong bu 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i kong bu stong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480a-26: bcu gcig la de kho na bzhin du rdo rje me dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480a-27: aom badzra a'a lo ke h'um zhes pa 'di mar me'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas yongs su bzlas la aom spha ra na kham zhes pa brjod cing dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480a-28: gtor ma'i nye bar spyod pa 'bum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480b-0: bkra shis can @480b dang por bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480b-1: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba rnams la de bzhin du rdo rje me yongs su bzlas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480b-2: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'a a'a dya nutpa nna tv'a ta ces pa brjod cing dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480b-8: gang yang rung ba la yi ge h'um dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480b-9: rol mo'i phyag rgya rdo rje khu tshur dag gi lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyis rol mo'i stang stabs rnam pa bcu bzhi 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480b-18: rnga ti mi la'i stang stabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480b-23: cod pan la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyang yi ge aom gyis mngon par bsngags te'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480b-24: de bzhin du dar dpyangs 'phyang bar bya zhing me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480b-25: rnga yab kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480b-27: dra ba phyed pas spras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480b-28: zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480b-33: brtags pa dang bcas pa yang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480b-34: rta babs nyams dga' ba'i dril bu dang bcas pa rnams kyang badzra spha ra na kham zhes pa 'dis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480b-35: aom badzra satv su sam gra h'a te dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480b-37: badzra dha rm'a g'a ya bee /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:480b-38: badzra ka rma ka ro dbha be zhes brjod cing gar byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481a-1: sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad po rnams kyis khor bo'i khu tshur gnyis dang ldan pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod phar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481a-2: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis rab tu brkyang ba khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481a-3: slar rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcu drug pa rnams kyis kyang legs par mchod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481a-4: khro bo'i rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481a-5: sems can thams cad kyi don du dngos grub thams cad 'grub par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481a-6: de nas phyi rol gyi mchod pa dbul te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481a-7: bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481a-8: 'bral yos bcas shing til dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481a-9: chu bcas zas bcas me tog bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481a-10: sran chan bcas shing snum khur la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481a-11: sogs pa'i bza' ba rnams la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481a-12: yang aa k'a ro mu kham zhes pa la sogs bzlas nas shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481a-13: gsum gsum gter bar byas te dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481a-17: mchod yon rnams kyang thog ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481a-19: de la dang po re zhig mandal rnams byed du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481b-0: de nas dam tshig bstan @481b no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481b-1: de nas mchod yon yang phul te dri la sogs pas legs par mchod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481b-3: de nas gshegs su gsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481b-6: shar phyogs su kha ba ltas te g-yas brkyang gi gom pas 'dug cing lag pa g-yon pas rdo rje bstan la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481b-7: g-yas pas dku'i phyogs su bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481b-8: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481b-9: de'i mdzub mo lcags kyu dang bral ba ni brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481b-10: g-yon pa brkyang gi gom pas 'dug la spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481b-12: na mo badzra sya di shi di shi badzra p'a ni raksha raksha sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481b-13: me'i phyogs su bltas te lag pa g-yas ba'i mdzub mo zlum po'i rnam par bkug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481b-14: gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshig gsum par btsugs la mthe bong lag mthil du bzhag pa ni me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481b-15: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong mdzub mo'i gzhogs la bstan pa ni me lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481b-16: phyag rgya de nyid lag pa'i dbus su mngon du phyogs te gcig tu sbyar ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:481b-17: de'i sngags ni aag na ye hi ae hya hi ka bi la dzva la da ha da ha shi khi to li bi r'u paksha sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482a-0: gshin rjer bltas te lag pa mdun du phyogs par byas @482a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482a-1: la nang du rdo rje bsdams pa'i dbus su mthe bong gnyis dang phyi ru ming med gnyis sbyar zhing bsgreng ste slar nang du bzung ba ni gshin rje spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482a-2: srin lag gnyis yang phyi rol du gshibs [?] te bsgred ba snying gar bzung ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482a-3: de nyid las srin lag sbyar ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482a-4: de'i sngags ni ya m'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482a-5: bde bral du bltas te mnyam pa'i gom pas 'dug la lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa mdzub mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482a-6: gung mo bkug ste bzung zhing dri'i rnam par bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482a-7: lag pa g-yon pa sta zur phyogs su g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug nas gzhag pa ni bden bral spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482a-8: phyag rgya de nyid lag pa g-yon pa sta zur phyogs su gnas par ral gri'i phyag rgya ni bden bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482a-9: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang pa ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482a-10: de'i sngags ni sarba bh'u ta bha yi ka ra ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482a-11: chu'i lha'i phyogs su mnyam pa'i gom pas 'dug la lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bong dang mdzub mo gcig tu sbyar te g-yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag la g-yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni chu bdag spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482b-0: phyag @482b rgya de nyid g-yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur la sbyar te bzung ba zhags pa'i phyag rgya chu bdag gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482b-1: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482b-2: de'i sngags ni tri tri phu ta tri tri shi khi to li bi r'a p'aksha sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482b-3: rlung lha'i phyogs su bltas te 'dug pa g-yon pa'i khu tshur bcagns te gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs gsum par mdzub mo bkug pa'i rtse mo btsugs la mngon du phyogs te brkyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482b-4: lag pa g-yas pa yang de bzhin du byas te sta zur logs su bzhag cing mthe bos bskul ba ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482b-5: de nyid mthe bong snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482b-6: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe pong brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482b-7: sngags ni aom sv'a sa kh'a kha kha kha sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482b-8: ku be ra la mngon du bltas te 'dug nas lag pa gnyis kha sphyar la rdo rje bcing ba nang du byas la mthe chung gnyis gshibs te brkyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482b-9: de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis sor bzhag nas gung mo dag bsgreng ba rdo rje'i mdud pa bya ba ni ku be ra spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:482b-10: phyag rgya de nyid kyis gung mo gnyis nang du rdo rje gung mo bcing ba'i sbyor bas gzhag pa ni ku be ra'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483a-0: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba @483a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483a-1: ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483a-2: de'i sngags ni aom ku be r'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483a-3: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la lag pa dag gcig tu sbyar te thal mo sbyar ba bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483a-5: mthe'u chung lag mthil du rdo rje bcing ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483a-6: mthe bo zung dag gzhan la brten cing nang du bkug ste bsnol la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483a-7: gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba'i rgyab tu mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i rnam par gzhag la de nyid bkug ste steng du phan tshun sen mo sprad par bya ba ni dbang ldan spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483a-8: de nyid kyi mdzub mo mo sngar bzhin rdo rje'i rnam par bzung ba ni dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483a-9: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483a-10: sngags ni dzum dzum shi ba sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483a-11: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dul la lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la steng du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyu ni tshangs pa la sogs pa spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483a-12: de nyid kyi mdzub mo gnyis snga ma ltar gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483a-13: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483a-14: de rnams kyi sngags ni aom a'u rdhvam prahma ne sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483a-15: s'u r+ya gra h'a dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483a-16: aom tsandra naksha tra aa dhi bat ye sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483b-0: mnyam @483b pa'i gom pa'i gnas pas 'dug la lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar ba ste sor mo'i rtse mo rnams par mtshams med par phan tshun sbyar te mthe bong zlum po byas la 'og tu bltas te sa'i lha mo la sogs pa mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni 'og gi lha mo spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483b-1: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las sngar bzhin du mdzub mo dag gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483b-2: mdzub mo dag brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483b-3: sngags rnams ni aa dho pri thi byee sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483b-4: aa su re bh+ya: sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483b-6: de nas rang gi sngags kyis thams cad la 'thor 'thung phul la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483b-7: bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs su bcas pa la bgegs med par mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483b-8: las kyi dngos grub kyang bdag la stsol cig ces brjod la thams cad gshegs su gsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483b-9: yang na dpung bzang gi ched du gsungs pa'i tshigs bcad rnams kyis gtor ma dbul te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483b-10: lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483b-11: nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzang lus srul po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483b-12: dri za srin po gdon gyi tshogs rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483b-13: gang su sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483b-14: bu smad bcas shing g-yog 'khor bcas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483b-15: bdag gi pus mo sa stengs 'dir btsugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483b-16: thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol 'debs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:483b-17: gsan nas phan gdags slad du 'dir spyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-1: dag ri rab steng gnas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-2: dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-3: shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim gnas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-4: ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-5: chu bo kun dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-6: rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-7: mtsho dang rdzing bu lteng ka chu ngogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-8: g-ya' chu sil ma can dang khron par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-9: grong dang phyags lhas grong khyer stong pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-10: kha stong dang ni lha yi khang par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-11: gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-12: dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-13: rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-14: lam srang bzhin mdo dag dang sum mdo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-15: gang dag lam po che dang shing gcig drung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-16: dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-17: sengge dred dang gcan gzan gnas dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-18: 'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-19: gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-20: lhun po dur khrod dag na gang gnas rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-21: dgyes shing mgu bas phreng ba byug pa dri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-22: bdug pa gtor ma mar me bstod pa'i 'dis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-23: gus 'bul snoms mdzod gsol mdzod 'thung mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-24: las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-25: de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484a-26: rtse gcig yid kyis phyogs skyong mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-0: dbang po rdo rje can gyi lha @484b tshogs 'khor dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-1: gtor ma khyad 'phags 'di dag bzhes su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-2: me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-3: chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-4: dbang ldan lha ste 'byung po'i bdag po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-5: steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-6: lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-7: ri yi lha dang gsang ba'i tshogs 'dus rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-8: dpung bcas sde bcas bu dang bshes gnyen bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-9: rang gi skye bo'i tshogs shing mnyes pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-10: so sor so so'i thugs dgongs gcig mdzad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-11: rang rang phyogs su legs par byon nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-12: rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-13: nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas thabs gcig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-14: me tog dri dang phyug pa mar me dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-15: zhal zas gtor ma 'di dag bzhes nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-16: gsol mdzod snoms mdzod legs par 'thung mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-17: las 'di rnams kyi 'bras su mchis par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-19: nang thams cad du gtor ma rab tu dbul ba'i sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-20: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am aa d+ya nutpanan tv'a ta zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:484b-21: de nas nye reg bya ste shar sgor mngon par phyogs te gnas pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485a-0: las thams cad pa'i thab khung gi dbus su dpal 'jig rten gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi sngags brjod cing me tog dmar pos nges par bkod la sbyin sreg gi @485a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485a-1: tshogs dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sngags kyis ba'i mar gyis sreg blug brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485a-2: dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags nas rdo rje 'bebs pa khro bo'i mthar thug par kyang sreg blugs bdun bdun slar yang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485a-3: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du thab khung gi rnam par snang mjad la sogs pa rnams me tog kho nas spyan drangs la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang gi gnas su dgod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485a-4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485a-5: bdag ming che ge zhes bgyi ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485a-6: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485a-7: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485a-8: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485a-9: 'dir yang dkyil 'khor 'jug pa la snod dang snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485a-10: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485a-12: sems can kha cig ni sdig pa chen po bgyid pa de rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di mthong ste zhugs nas ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485a-17: 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485a-18: dam tshig la mi 'da' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485b-0: sngags spyod pa la sogs pa 'dod cing mi nus pa'i sems can dag mchis @485b te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485b-1: de dag kyang 'dir ji ltar bya bar 'dod pa bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485b-3: sems can kha cig gi gar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485b-7: kha zas la spyod pa la dga' ba nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po chos nyid khong du ma chud pas lha'i rigs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485b-9: de bzhin du rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor pa thams cad yang dag par rdzogs par 'gyur ba bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485b-11: rangs pa rnams 'byung bar mdzad pa der ni bslab pa'i gnas la 'jigs shing skrag nas mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485b-12: ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du ji ltar gnas pa'i bde ba'i bdag nyid kyi gnas skabs can de dag kyang dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485b-13: mgu ba dang dam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485b-15: yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485b-16: ngan song gi rgyud thams cad du 'jug bar kha bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug tu rung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485b-18: chos ldan gyis sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:485b-20: shes h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug tu rung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486a-2: sa rnams la 'bad pas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba dag kyang mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486a-3: de dag kyang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid thams cad kyang rnyed par dka' ba yang ma lags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486a-4: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes gsol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486a-5: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486a-6: de la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su bzung ba'i dge bsnyen nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486a-8: dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su gzung zhing slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486a-9: slob dpon gyi zhabs dag la phyag byas te 'di skad ces brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486a-10: bdag gi ston pa dga' chen khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486a-11: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486a-12: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486a-13: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486a-14: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486a-15: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486a-17: de nas slob ma la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dmar po'i stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486a-18: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sgo skyong bzhi bzlas pa'i gdong g-yogs bcing bar byas la phyag bzhi byed du bzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486a-19: yang lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas slob dpon la phyag byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486a-20: lag na me tog thogs pa nyid kyis bshags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-0: @486b rjes su yi rang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-2: gsol ba gdab pa byas la 'di skad ces brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-3: gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-4: thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-5: sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-6: bdag ming che ge zhes bgyi ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-7: slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-8: sangs rgyas rol mo 'byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-9: phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-10: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-11: gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-12: gsang ba thams cad rigs bsdus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-13: slob dpon bdag ni 'jug par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-14: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-15: skal ba chen pos dag la stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-16: mtshan rnams rjes su gsol btab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-17: dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-18: sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-19: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-20: dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-21: sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-22: bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-23: slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-24: de nas slob dpon gyi rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-25: che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-26: byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-29: de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-30: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:486b-31: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-2: dam tshig sdom pa brtan por gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-3: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-4: blo gros chen po khyod kyis zung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-5: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-6: shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-7: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-8: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-9: 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-10: sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-11: rin chen rigs ni bsdus pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-12: nyin mo gsum dang mtshan mo gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-13: zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-14: sbyin pa rnams bzhi rab sbyin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-15: phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-16: dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-18: dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-19: las chen rigs ni bsdus pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-20: sdom pa gsum po yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-21: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-22: yang dag nyid du nges gzung gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-23: de las gzhan pa bzhi po yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-24: 'di dag phas pham par ni bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-25: mi spang dor bar yang mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-26: rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-27: nyin mo gsum dang mtshan gsum du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-28: nyin re zhing ni brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-29: gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-30: ltung ba sbom po dag tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-31: khyod kyi srog chags gsad mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-32: ma byin par yang mi blang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487a-33: 'dod pa log par mi spyad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-0: brdzun yang @487b smra bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-1: phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-2: chang ni btung ba rnam par spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-3: sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-4: bya ba ma yin thams cad spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-5: dam pa'i drung du gnas bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-6: rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-7: lus kyi las ni rnam pa gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-8: ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-9: yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-10: ci nus pas ni rjes su bskyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-11: theg pa dman la dga' mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-12: sems can don la rgyab phyogs min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-13: 'kor ba dag kyang yongs mi spang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-14: rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-15: lha dang lha min gsang ba pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-16: khyod kyis brnyas pa mi bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-17: phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-18: mtshan ma 'gom pa yang mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-19: 'di dag dam tshig ces bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-20: bdag ni blo gros khyed kyis bsrung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-21: des kyang 'di skad brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-22: slob dpon khyod ni bdag la gson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-23: gtso bo ji ltar bka' bsgo ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-24: de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-25: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-26: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-28: sems can mya ngan las 'das la dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-29: ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-30: gang zhig sdom pa mi 'dzin pa de la ni gzhug pa tsam sbyin par bya zhing deng khyod bya ba la sogs pa brjod par mi bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-31: slob dpon du dbang bskur ba yang mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:487b-32: de nas aom sarba yo gtsittam aud p'a da y'a mi zhes pa 'dis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-2: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-3: de yi snying gar snyed pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-4: rdo rje rab tu gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-5: sya ra ta sa ma ya stvam ho: badzra siddhi ya th'a su kham zhes pa 'dis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-6: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la dri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-7: me tog la sogs pas mchod de me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-8: gdong dri zhim pos byugs la yon gyi mchog bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-9: phyi rol na gnas pa la bum pa'i chus dbang skur la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-10: aom grihna badzra sa ma ya h'um bam zhes pa 'dis khro bo ti rin ti ri rang nyid bcings la slob ma 'ching du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-11: rdo rje bsdams pa nang byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-12: mthe bong rdo rje dam po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-13: yid kyi khro bas dga' bya bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-14: khro bo ti rin ti ri dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-15: de nas de nyid mthe bong dag gi me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la snying po 'dis gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-16: badzra sa ma yam pra ti shy'a mi zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-17: shar gyi sgor yang rdo rje lcags kyus de dgug cing lhor zhags pas gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-18: nub tu lcags sgrog gis bcing zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-19: byang du rdo rje 'bebs pas dbab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-20: yang shar gyi sgo nas de bzhin du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488a-21: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi de nas ngas khyod la rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed par bya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-0: ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs @488b pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-1: dngos grub gzhan rnams lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-2: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-3: khyod dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ta re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-4: de nas rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid khro bo ti rin ti ri kha gyen du blta ba dang bcas pas bcings la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-5: rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-6: 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-7: gal te khyed 'ga' zhig la smras na spyi bo 'gems par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-8: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-9: mna'i snying po lan gcig bzlas pa'i chu rdo rje slob ma de 'thung du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-10: de la mna'i snying po 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyed kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-12: snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-13: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-14: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-16: de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-17: deng nas brtsams nas khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-18: ngas 'di gyis shig ces gang bsgo ba de bya dgos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-19: khyod kyi nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-20: khyod ya nga ba ma spangs par tshe'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-21: de'i rjes la rang gi snying gar yi ge aa rdo rje'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan par bsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:488b-22: de nas slob ma'i snying ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-0: spyi bo rnams su zla ba'i @489a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-1: dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-4: sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-5: h'um tr'am hr'i: aa: zhes pa 'di dag gi go rims bzhin du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-6: sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas rang dang slob ma'i snying gar phye la rang gi snying ga'i yi ge yam las yi ge phyung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-7: slob ma'i snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su slos bcug la lus thams cad gang bar bsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab tu gsol zhes smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-11: de nas myur du rdo rje slob dpon gyis khro bo ti rin ti ri bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-12: 'di de dam tshig rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-13: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-14: rdo rje ye shes bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-15: khyod la de nyid 'bab gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-16: badzra a'a be sha a'a: zhes pa bcu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-25: lan brgyar brjod de nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-26: de nas rdo rje'i khu tshur bcings la sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya dral bar bya zhing 'di dag brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-29: grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-30: na ya ho bha ga b'an badzra bi dya ra dza h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489a-31: aa: aa: aa: aa: aa: bcu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje h'um gi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi mdog dmar po 'bar ba gang bzhin par bsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489b-3: slar yang gal te 'bab par ma gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489b-4: de'i tshe dril bu dang bcas pas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la rkang pa g-yon pas de'i rkang pa mnan la steng gi nam mkha'i phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi steng du de nyid la dbab pa'i phyir khro bo h'um gi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis mnan bzhin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489b-5: 'og nas kyang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang h'um gi rnam pas brdeg bzhin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489b-6: de bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su bzhugs pa'i mi bskyong ba la sogs pa'i rnams kyis h'um tr'am hr'i: aa: zhes bya ba rang gi sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis yang dag par 'bebs par mdzad par bsam zhing de la dbab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489b-7: h'um badzra a'a be sha ya aa: zhes rnam pa brgyar brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489b-8: gal te sdig pa mang ba nyid kyis 'bab par ma gyur na de'i tshe sdig pa bral ba'i phyag rgyas de'i sdig pa rnams yang dang yang du bral bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489b-9: yam shing 'jag ma rnams kyi me //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489b-10: rab 'bar rdo rje khro bo yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489b-11: mnyam par gzhag pas dbul ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489b-12: de yi sdig pa thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489b-13: til gyi sbyin sreg des nges bsreg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:489b-14: aom sarba p'a pa da ha na badzr'a ya sv'ah'a zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490a-1: g-yas pa'i mthil du til nag po las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490a-2: yi ge h'um dbus su bsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490a-3: mdzub mo dang mthe bong dag gis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490a-4: de nas sbyin sreg gi thab khung las 'byung ba'i 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun tu 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje rnams kyis de'i lus la sdig pa sreg bzhin par bsams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490a-5: de nas yang rdo rje babs pa de kho na bzhin du bcings la dbab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490a-7: de lta bus kyang gang la bab par ma gyur pa de la dbang bskur mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490a-8: babs na skad cig ma de nyid de'i mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490a-9: de nas yang dag par babs par shes nas yang aom badzra satva su sam gra h'a ta zhes pa la sogs pa'i glu brjod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490a-10: khro bo'i khu tshur dang de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dral bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490a-11: de phebs na rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490a-12: de'i tshe slob dpon gyis rdo rje khu tshur khro bo'i phyag rgyas bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490a-13: de bzhin du ji srid du gyur na de'i tshe rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490a-14: de'i tshe rdo rje chos khro bo'i phyag rgya bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490a-15: de lta bus nye bar byon cing dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490a-16: de nas de'i lce la rdo rje bsams te bru hi badzra zhes pa brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490a-17: de nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-0: de nas phreng ba @490b de dkyil 'khor chen por dor te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-2: de nas gang du babs pa de 'dis 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-3: de nas aom pra ti gri hna tvam ai mam satva mah'a ba la zhes bya bas phreng ba de nyid kyi mgo bor bcing ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-5: aom de ring rdo rje sems dpa' rang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-6: khyod kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-7: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-8: thams cad mig ni bye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-9: he badzra p'a shya zhes pa 'dis gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-10: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-11: ji srid rnam par snang mdzad kyi mthar thug par bstan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-12: de nas tishtha badzra zhes pa la sogs pas slob ma'i snying gar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-13: de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-14: phyi rol du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar sgo la mngon par phyogs pa legs par bris la slob ma dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pas kyang byin gyis brlabs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-15: phyag rgya chen po de la bzhag ste dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-16: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de mchod yon dbul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-19: ba dan la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-21: rol mo la sogs pa'i sgra bsgrags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:490b-22: de nas bkra shis kyi tshigs cad rnams kyis mngon par dga' bas dang po re zhig chu'i dbang skur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491a-0: ming gis dbang bskur ba dag gis dbang @491a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491a-1: bskur la yang me tog la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491a-2: sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad kyis mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491a-3: slob ma rnams kyi rdo rje thal mo sbyar bas slob dpon la rab tu btud la yon gyi mchog phul la me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba yang gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491a-4: slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba ni dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyas de kho na bzhin du ji ltar nges par bstan pa'i gnas su bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491a-5: de tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis de'i lus la dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa bkod de slar yang aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi dri dho me bha ba dza: h'um bam ho: h'um phat zhes pa 'di rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la brgya rtsa brgyad dam steng yongs su bzlas pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491a-7: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes pa 'di brjod cing rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa nas chu blangs la chu'i dbang bskur ba byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491a-9: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491a-10: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491a-11: dam tshig bsrung na dngos grub ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491a-12: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chus 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491a-13: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491a-14: dkyil 'khor can min na mi smra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491a-15: skye bo 'dus pa gnas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491a-16: rgod dang ma dang pa la min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491a-17: de nas chog thams cad nyams su blangs la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas legs par bstod de tshigs bcad lngas rjes su gnang bar byin nas gzangs bstod pa dang lung bstan pas slob ma thams cad lung bstan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-0: de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba @491b byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-1: slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa dkyil 'khor thams cad du bcug pa de ltar mdzod cig ces bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-2: 'di yi las kyi dngos grub ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-3: ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-4: tha ma 'bring dang mchog rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-6: mchog gi sa rnams bgegs med 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-7: dngos grub phran tshegs slar ci zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-8: sangs rgyas nyid kyang sems can nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-9: rdo rje sems nyid snyed mi dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-10: gang la dngos grub nges 'byung dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-11: gang la sdig pa gdon chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-12: bgegs dang log 'dren rnams dang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-13: 'chi bdag dang ni bdud sde rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-14: 'jigs pa sna tshogs bstan bcos rno //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-15: dngos grub las 'joms de dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-16: bdag nyid chen po de la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-18: sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-19: nges par dngos grub myur rab 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-20: lha rnams kyang ni cher gnyes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-21: skad cig gis kyang rab rnyed 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-22: yams dang nyer 'tshe skyon la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-23: chos lci nges par ring du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-24: de yi yul du nad dang don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-25: rims la sogs pa mi 'byur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-26: mu ge ca co chen rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-27: pha rol dmag tshogs nyams par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-28: lha dang klu rnams spro chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-29: bde bar yang ni skyong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-30: rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-32: gnod sbyin rnams dang gza' la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-33: rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyis skyong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:491b-34: de nas brgya byin la sogs lhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-2: rin chen gdugs sogs mchog rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-3: rnam pa sna tshogs mchod byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-4: phyag na rdo rje rgyal dbang la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-5: dag pa'i bsam pas yang dag bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-6: sangs rgyas kun bas sngar [?] sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-7: mi shes dri ma kun bcom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-8: rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-10: rdo rje'i sku ste sku che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-12: rdo rje yan lag rdo rje mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-14: rdo rje shugs te shugs che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-15: rdo rje mtshon cha mtshon cha cher //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-16: phyag na rdo rje phyag chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-17: rdo rje mda' ste rab 'bigs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-18: rdo rje rnon po rnon po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-19: che ba'i che ba rgya mtsho che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-20: rdo rje padma byang chub che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-21: byang chub sangs rgyas rang 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-22: rdo rje rgya chen rgya chen che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-23: rdo rje sgyu ma rnam sbyong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-24: rdo rje rgyu ste gnod sbyin che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-25: rdo rje padma rnam sbyong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-26: rdo rje khro bo gtum po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-27: rdo rje dgra sdang 'joms pa'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-28: rdo rje 'jigs byed srung ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-29: rdo rje lcags kyu don yod byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-30: rdo rje ro langs ro langs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-31: rdo rje srin po za ba po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-32: rdo rje gnod sbyin gnod sbyin che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-33: rdo rje gdon te gdon gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-34: 'jigs rung skrag byed ma rungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-35: drag po 'jigs byed rngam byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-36: bsgrub dka' sgrub pa legs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-37: rdo rje legs pa dgyes mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-38: rdo rje dga' ba dga' ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-39: dga' ba'i rdo rje dbang byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-40: rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-42: rdo rje drag po drag po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492a-43: 'od mthug pa ni mthug pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-0: nam mkha' dang ni @492b mnyam pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-1: re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-2: rdo rje dbang bskur rin chen mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-3: rdo rje rgyal mtshan yon tan mtsho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-4: rdo rje ye shes ye shes che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-5: rig pa bye ba'i tshogs kyis mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-6: ha la ha la nag po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-7: sgra chen rnam par sgreg pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-9: snyigs ma'i rnyog ma 'joms pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-10: dus kyi g-yo ba'i gcod pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-11: zhal ni ljags kyi glog 'phro ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-12: rdo rje me ste rab tu gtum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-13: gtum pa'i rab snang 'dzoms pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-14: nyi ma stong gi 'od zer zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-15: spyan dmar 'jigs par mdzad pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-17: phyag ni du ma'i mtshon cha brgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-18: du ma'i zhal te sku yang stong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-20: thugs chos bdag nyid sku mi mnga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-21: rnam par rtog pa ma lus spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-22: ma rig 'joms pa tshangs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-23: 'dod chags zhe sdang dri mthar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-24: sgyu ma khyab 'jug rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-26: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-27: srid dang srid min rnam sbyong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-28: zhi zhing dul la dag pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-29: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rab rtogs mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-30: sangs rgyas bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-31: rdo rje legs skyes rdo rje sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-32: kun tu bzang po cher bzang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-33: mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-34: khams kun bdag nyid khyab pa bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-35: thams cad rdo rje'i bdag nyid gtsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-36: gang gis 'di bris klog pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-37: rtag tu don ni 'chang byed dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-38: dran nam nyan par byed kyang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-39: phyag na rdo rje mnyam par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:492b-40: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-0: tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i @493a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-6: srin po la sogs pa phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-7: bde ba thob pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-8: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen po de bandre de ba'i zhabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-9: bla ma pan chen skyes bu chen po m'a ni ka shr'idzny'a na'i zhal snga nas gus par mnyan te chag lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtam la phab pa ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-10: spre'u lo dbyug gu zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes bcu gsum la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-11: gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thang po cher dbu btsugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-12: smin drug zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis kyi snga dro'i bar zhag bco lngar 'gro ba'i tshe dpal 'dren gyi lha'i gdings su tshar bar bgyis so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-13: dpal ldan rgyud rgyal ngan song sbyong ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-14: brtag pa phyogs gcig sngar grags kha che nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-15: chos rgyal sku drin pan chen sgra bsgyur mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-16: skyes chen rnams kyis legs par dar bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-17: 'di ni dpal ldan kun dga' snying po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-18: rje btsun 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-19: man ngag la brten rgya gar bal po na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-20: ye shes [?] grags bla ma'i drin las kho bos bsgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-21: sgra gzhung bla ma'i gsung bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-22: gus bsgyur nongs pa mkhas chen rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-23: bzod mdzad de dges 'gro ba kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-010:493a-24: 'gro mgon thub chen nyid gyur cig /
